['', 'React/Redux/Saga', "We've always had multiple locations so working/collaborating remotely has always been a\xa0part of our DNA.\xa0Like many others, since the global pandemic hit, we've transitioned our physical offices to everyone working from home for at least the next 6-9 months. We've found that it has not affected our productivity and have become more remote oriented as a result.", 'Paid holidays', 'Our Culture and Core Values', 'You communicate well', 'Groove is committed to ensuring the security and protection of the personal information that we process, and to provide a compliant and consistent approach to data protection. All submitted resumes, regardless of location, will be deleted after 1 year.', 'Qualifications:', "4+ years of experience; at least 2 in either Ruby on Rails and/or React/Redux are a major plusYou value writing tests, pairing, and making an impact on end usersYou enjoy white-boarding data models and workflows with othersYou've built and supported things that operate in production and at scaleYou seek the best solution given real life constraints - not the best academic answer.You communicate wellYou take initiative and ownership by identifying issues and fixing them or communicating them with the team without being askedYou're comfortable with modern front end frameworks like React/ReduxYou're intellectually curiousYou're passionate about building technology to help the workflows of a historically neglected user-base", 'Groove is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. We offer highly competitive compensation packages and excellent benefits, including medical/dental/vision insurance, flexible PTO, and a\xa0matching 401K.\xa0', "We're looking for awesome, well rounded engineers who want to take on big challenges, collaborate closely with others, grow a lot, and help shape the future of the company.\xa0You will have a direct influence on product and technology decisions and help define our culture as we change how companies and teams sell.", '4+ years of experience; at least 2 in either Ruby on Rails and/or React/Redux are a major plus', 'You take initiative and ownership by identifying issues and fixing them or communicating them with the team without being asked', "We serve some of the most historically underserved users, many of whom have been stuck using unintuitive and clunky software for their whole careers. It's not uncommon that users spend 4-6 hours+ a day using and interacting with Groove. Our goal is to elevate the user and the work they can do.", 'You enjoy white-boarding data models and workflows with others', '401k match', "You're passionate about building technology to help the workflows of a historically neglected user-base", 'Tech Stack', 'Medical/dental/vision insurance', 'Our values speak volumes about who we are, both as individuals and as a team. At Groove, we put our team before ourselves and are dedicated to ensuring that our teammates are happy and satisfied, both in their careers and their work environment. We are a team of high-performers that operate in a culture of empathy and transparency, with a natural curiosity to continually grow. We put the team before ourselves, care more and enjoy the journey above all else. These are only a few of the reasons that we have a five-star rating on Glassdoor.\xa0\xa0', 'Fun, collaborative, and balanced culture ', "This specific role is one of the first fully remote positions and we're excited to see what new talent we can bring into Groove from new locations in Canada and the US!", 'Flexible PTO', 'A note about remote work / COVID19\xa0-\xa0', "You're comfortable with modern front end frameworks like React/Redux", 'Groove is the leading sales engagement platform for enterprises using Salesforce, specializing in ease-of-use, ease-of-administration, and cross-team collaboration. Built for the needs of full-cycle sellers, Groove automates non-sales activities so that pre- and post-sales reps can spend more time building relationships and generating revenue. On average, Groove gives revenue teams 20% of their time back to focus on higher-value activities. Groove’s Salesforce-native architecture ensures more accurate reporting and forecasting, lower compliance risk with global privacy laws, and streamlined administration.\xa0', 'A stocked kitchen and cold brew and kombucha on tap', "You've built and supported things that operate in production and at scale", 'GraphQL', 'Life Insurance', "Our engineering organization is split into product based squads. You'll be joining one of these squads and working most closely with each engineer and product manager within the squad.", 'Chrome Extensions / Salesforce APEX', 'Ruby on RailsReact/Redux/SagaGraphQLPostgres/Redis/FirestoreChrome Extensions / Salesforce APEX', 'Groove was named one of\xa0 Inc. Magazine’s Best Workplaces 2020 and is one of the 2020 Inc. 5000 fastest-growing privately held companies in the U.S. Groove also ranks #14 on the San Francisco Business Times\' "fastest-growing private companies in the Bay Area in 2019." Founded in 2014, Groove is headquartered in San Francisco with offices in San Diego and Seattle. To learn more, visit groove.co.', 'Benefits:', 'You seek the best solution given real life constraints - not the best academic answer.', 'Benefits: ', 'Postgres/Redis/Firestore', 'About the Role', 'Stock options', "You're intellectually curious", 'If this sounds like your next ideal career move, we would love to hear from you.', 'You value writing tests, pairing, and making an impact on end users', 'Medical/dental/vision insuranceLife InsuranceFlexible PTOPaid holidaysStock options401k matchA stocked kitchen and cold brew and kombucha on tapFun, collaborative, and balanced culture ', 'Over 50,000 account executive, sales development, and customer success representatives use Groove at some of the world’s largest and fastest-growing companies, including Google, Uber, BBVA, and Capital One. Groove has earned the highest customer satisfaction rating on G2 in the sales engagement category for over two years in a row.\xa0', 'Ruby on Rails', 'Tech Stack:']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Work in a collaborative fashion with engineers of all levels and product management to maintain a high bar for quality and product useability', 'Desired Experience', '*At this time, mParticle is unable to sponsor visas for this role, unfortunately.', 'Develop secure, well-tested and performant features and improvements to the mParticle platform', 'Employment opportunities are available to all applicants without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Experience in one or more general purpose programming languages', '\ufeff', '2+ years of experience contributing to a backend system or API', 'Here at mParticle, everyone is equal. We\xa0believe strongly in our values\xa0and are looking for someone who demonstrates empathy and sincerity to all roles and teammates. Our ideal candidate has a strong balance of technical and people skill and is a proven mentor and technical leader.\xa0', 'Here at mParticle we embrace the differences that make us unique. We are dedicated to building an inclusive environment that fosters respect and celebrates an array of backgrounds and perspectives.', 'mParticle is expanding and looking for a Software Engineer to join our core platform team! The mParticle data pipeline is a critical extension of infrastructure for some of the biggest brands and their engineering teams, processing and delivering 10+ billion daily requests at low latency. On the Growth squad, you will work together with a team of engineers, product managers, and designers to adapt that pipeline to serve the next 10,000 engineering teams.', "Craft code that adheres to the team's quality and style guidelines, and encourage those guidelines through in-depth code reviews", "Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience", "Develop secure, well-tested and performant features and improvements to the mParticle platformWork in a collaborative fashion with engineers of all levels and product management to maintain a high bar for quality and product useabilityAdvocate for product quality, security, and performance initiativesCraft code that adheres to the team's quality and style guidelines, and encourage those guidelines through in-depth code reviews", 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', 'Founded in 2013, mParticle is the leading customer data platform that unlocks the full power of data for businesses. The company empowers brands to accelerate their growth strategy to keep pace with their customers by providing the most advanced data platform for web and apps across all devices in the marketplace. A trusted partner among renowned brands such as Airbnb, Foursquare, Hulu, King, and Spotify among many others, the mParticle platform has grown to manage over 1 billion mobile users each month, capturing over $5 billion in ecommerce transactions and processes over 250 billion API calls. Recognized as one of Crain’s 100 Best Places to Work in New York City and named to Gartner’s “Cool Vendors in Mobile App Development” list, mParticle has 45 employees and is headquartered in New York City with offices in San Francisco, Florida, Seattle and London.', 'If the above sounds interesting, here are some details to help you determine whether this is the right role for you!', '\xa0', 'Experience using RESTful and/or RPC APIs', 'About mParticle', "Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experienceExperience in one or more general purpose programming languages2+ years of experience contributing to a backend system or APIExperience using RESTful and/or RPC APIsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsAbility to thrive in a fully remote organization", "The Growth squad is empowered to make cross-cutting improvements to platform usability, performance, and stability to ensure positive first- and long-term developer experience. As a Software Engineer you'll have the opportunity to rethink mParticle's streaming infrastructure and build APIs that other engineers will love and rely on. You'll also be able to drive mParticle's engineering culture through continual research, self-improvement and internal presentation.", 'Ability to thrive in a fully remote organization', 'Advocate for product quality, security, and performance initiatives']

['', 'Ability to write code that is well structured, idiomatic, reusable, and easy to understand.', 'Competitive compensation + equity participation', 'Responsibilities', 'Benefits', 'Excellent communicator: expert in explaining technical problems in person and in writing', 'Have a direct impact on problems that affect real people - our users depend on us to help them integrate positive change and fulfillment into their lives.Use data-driven methods to form opinions and make informed decisions on our technical architectureCollaborate cross-functionally with product, marketing, and operations to build elegant software to solve problems for our customers and team members alike.Estimate and prioritize features for new and existing applicationsStay up to date with latest technology trendsMaintain and improve existing systemsSet the engineering code of conduct, culture, and more by being both a leader and individual contributor.Interview and hire other engineers as we continue to grow.', 'Maintain and improve existing systems', 'Stay up to date with latest technology trends', 'You will be working alongside the Founder & CEO, a former software engineer and product manager for Goldman Sachs, Stitch Fix, The Muse, and Fueled. As one of our first full-time hires, you will be instrumental in paving the way for company culture, which means being open and honest about your working style and needs.', "Come join us as a founding engineer! At Silk + Sonder, we're building a platform and community to make women's daily self-help and self-care easy, fun, and approachable for modern women, from the comfort of their homes. We have a growing user base across all 50 states who loves our inaugural product: a guided monthly wellness planner / journal. We're committed to using personalization, accountability, and accessibility to make mental wellness practices a proactive affair, catalyzing positive growth in our customers’ lives no matter what setback or milestone they face.", 'Flexible work-from-anywhere-anytime policy (we love world travelers, homebodies, and everything in between as long as things get done!)', '5+ years of Software Development experience.', 'BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience.', 'Experience working with full stack web application development and cross-platform mobile application development in a team environment.', 'Use data-driven methods to form opinions and make informed decisions on our technical architecture', "Curious Team Player: you're excited to learn, collaborate, and teach the team on new concepts.", 'Collaborative, fast-paced team environment that offers ownership and autonomy alongside working with incredibly smart, authentic people', 'Set the engineering code of conduct, culture, and more by being both a leader and individual contributor.', 'Experience with React, React Native/Expo development + Apollo Client.Experience with PostGres, NodeJS, and GraphQL.Experience with AWS, Heroku or similar infrastructure services.An understanding of building applications at scale. We are a VC-backed mental wellness startup shaping the way we integrate self-help and self-care into our daily lives. We’re launching and scaling our mobile application and are looking for full stack and front end mobile engineers who are excited to be at the forefront of emotional health.', 'Introspective, wellness experiences and retreats', "BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience.5+ years of Software Development experience.Experience working with full stack web application development and cross-platform mobile application development in a team environment.Strong understanding of complex native mobile applications to help set the direction for mobile as we scale.Ability to write code that is well structured, idiomatic, reusable, and easy to understand.Interest and ability to learn coding languages, best practices and new technologies.Excellent communicator: expert in explaining technical problems in person and in writingCurious Team Player: you're excited to learn, collaborate, and teach the team on new concepts.User-Obsessed: you're driven by delivering value to our end-user and willing to listen and learn from them directly as you evaluate technical trade-offsTake pride in executing and delivering independently, assume responsibility and ownership of your code", 'Estimate and prioritize features for new and existing applications', '\xa0', 'Requirements', 'Bonus Requirements:', 'Experience with PostGres, NodeJS, and GraphQL.', 'Interview and hire other engineers as we continue to grow.', 'Strong understanding of complex native mobile applications to help set the direction for mobile as we scale.', 'Take pride in executing and delivering independently, assume responsibility and ownership of your code', "User-Obsessed: you're driven by delivering value to our end-user and willing to listen and learn from them directly as you evaluate technical trade-offs", 'An understanding of building applications at scale. Web and network optimization experience is a MAJOR plus.', 'Collaborate cross-functionally with product, marketing, and operations to build elegant software to solve problems for our customers and team members alike.', 'Have a direct impact on problems that affect real people - our users depend on us to help them integrate positive change and fulfillment into their lives.', 'Experience with React, React Native/Expo development + Apollo Client.', 'Unlimited vacation + company holidays', 'Direct impact on improving women’s relationships with themselves as well as with others', 'About the Company']

['', 'Experience with Go, Java, Python and other languages', 'Scale - Work on a data pipeline handling more than one billion events per dayAvailability - Support infrastructure with 100% uptimeReliability - Increase system reliability beyond 99.9999%Innovate - Challenge what we have today to build industry leading applications at scale. Take advantage of dedicated time for personal growth, learn new technologies and build tools to assist your daily processImpact - Support multiple industry verticals including financial services, healthcare, telecommunications, media and more', 'We offer competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits program for full-time employees, including medical, dental and vision coverage, paid time off, life insurance, disability coverage, employee assistance program, 401(k) plan and a paid parental leave program.', 'Familiarity with relational databases, NoSQL databases, Prometheus and Grafana a plus', 'Experience with event driven architecture', 'Experience working with distributed architecturesExperience with AWS or GCPExperience working with highly traffic systems upwards of 10k req/secExperience with event driven architectureExperience with Go, Java, Python and other languagesFamiliarity with relational databases, NoSQL databases, Prometheus and Grafana a plus', 'Founded in 2000, Red Ventures is a portfolio of growing digital businesses that bring consumers and brands together through integrated e-commerce, strategic partnerships and many proprietary brands including Bankrate, AllConnect.com and Reviews.com. Headquartered south of Charlotte, NC, Red Ventures has over 3000 employees in offices across the US, as well as London and Sao Paulo.\xa0For more information, visit www.redventures.com.', 'Who We Are:\xa0', 'Availability - Support infrastructure with 100% uptime', 'Reliability - Increase system reliability beyond 99.9999%', "Red Ventures is an equal opportunity employer that does not discriminate against any employee or applicant because of race, creed, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, national origin, disability, age, genetic information, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy or any other basis protected by law. Employment at Red Ventures is based solely on a person's merit and qualifications.\xa0", 'Scale - Work on a data pipeline handling more than one billion events per day', 'Experience working with highly traffic systems upwards of 10k req/sec', 'We are committed to providing equal employment opportunities to qualified individuals with disabilities. This includes providing reasonable accommodation where appropriate. Should you require a reasonable accommodation to apply or participate in the job application or interview process, please contact accommodation@redventures.com.', 'What You’ll Do:', 'As a Software Engineer at Red Ventures, you’ll work closely with Product Managers, Data Scientists, and other Software Engineers to build the latest in next-generation technologies that change how millions of users connect, explore, and interact with brands during key milestones of their lives. Our Software Engineers work on a variety of things like information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage to machine learning—all while using the latest tools and technologies to push us forward into the future. We are not looking for followers, rather leaders willing to mentor our teams.\xa0', 'What We’re Looking For:', 'Innovate - Challenge what we have today to build industry leading applications at scale. Take advantage of dedicated time for personal growth, learn new technologies and build tools to assist your daily process', 'Impact - Support multiple industry verticals including financial services, healthcare, telecommunications, media and more', 'Experience working with distributed architectures', 'Experience with AWS or GCP']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Data Acquisition Team
job_text: ['', 'About you:', 'AWS experience with common services (EKS, Dynamo, etc)Familiar with Scrum and Agile methodologiesWilling to jump in to areas other than pure software development, ie: creating architectures that are easily monitored from a devops perspective', 'Experience with node, linux, and k8s\xa0', 'Troubleshoot and provide solutions to product issues', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science\xa0', 'Familiar with Scrum and Agile methodologies', '5+ years of professional enterprise\xa0software development experience.\xa0Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science\xa0Experience with node, linux, and k8s\xa0Fast learner; eager to work with new technologies.\xa0Able to adequately balance speed of delivery against quality of solution based on requirements.', 'About Clarabridge', 'Lead the technical evolution of a major piece of our platformDesign, write, test, and deploy production-grade code using Node, typescript, go, k8s,\xa0jenkins, mongo, github, etcAct in a DevOps fashion to deploy, monitor, and scale our softwareNourish and amplify\xa0great coding principles and\xa0practicesImprove both our software and our development process as you go\xa0Work with teammates to pair program and review/test code\xa0Troubleshoot and provide solutions to product issuesBe a vibrant and enthusiastic contributor to multiple development and support teams across our organization', 'Design, write, test, and deploy production-grade code using Node, typescript, go, k8s,\xa0jenkins, mongo, github, etc', 'Act in a DevOps fashion to deploy, monitor, and scale our software', 'Fast learner; eager to work with new technologies.\xa0', 'Clarabridge’s\xa0customer experience management platform helps hundreds of the world’s leading brands understand and improve the customer journey. With over 310 employees and offices in Reston, London, San Francisco, Barcelona, Ghent, and Singapore,\xa0Clarabridge\xa0is an internationally recognized leader in the Customer Experience Management industry. Our culture is people-focused, results-oriented, and customer-obsessed.\xa0', 'What you’ll do:', 'Nourish and amplify\xa0great coding principles and\xa0practices', 'Improve both our software and our development process as you go\xa0', 'Able to adequately balance speed of delivery against quality of solution based on requirements.', 'AWS experience with common services (EKS, Dynamo, etc)', 'Willing to jump in to areas other than pure software development, ie: creating architectures that are easily monitored from a devops perspective', 'Required', "The team you’d be joining is the Data Acquisition team, which is responsible for loading data from any and all disparate data sources into one unified hub for analysis.\xa0Lots of challenges around massive scaling, observability, blue/green deployment, code efficiency, etc - it's a lot of fun for the right person!", 'Be a vibrant and enthusiastic contributor to multiple development and support teams across our organization', '\xa0', 'Preferred', 'Work with teammates to pair program and review/test code\xa0', 'We are seeking a collaborative, curious, progressive,\xa0and enthusiastic Software Engineering lead to work on all aspects of our containerized\xa0data integration software, including the backend services, APIs, CI/CD Pipeline,\xa0UIs, and everything else.\xa0We use AWS and k8s\xa0heavily, write most of our code in typescript and go, run almost exclusively on linux, and\xa0use a variety of backend queueing systems and databases. We deploy at least\xa0every two weeks (often more frequently) using a light and unobtrusive scrum process with great Product Owners and motivated team members.', 'Lead the technical evolution of a major piece of our platform', '5+ years of professional enterprise\xa0software development experience.\xa0']

We prize teamwork, and support each other in providing the best results for our clients. No one on our team is superior to another - we help each other out, in the spirit of personal growth.We don’t deploy into infrastructure, we build with infrastructure", 'Experience with a cloud platform and using containers']

['', 'Collaborate with Product Management to ensure that the implementation is in accordance with the requirements and that the features meet expectations.', 'Expeto was founded on a simple, yet compelling principle - enable meaningful IoT outcomes by transforming traditional mobile network complexity into IT simplicity. Expeto integrates mobile networks and IoT applications onto a single platform specifically designed for enterprise use cases and is sold as a service leveraging modern cloud and edge computing resources. Expeto believes that harnessing data from connected devices around the world will unlock insights that shape business strategy, create new revenue opportunities, and help companies make better, more informed decisions to ensure a sustainable future.', 'Sustainability and efficiency are a way of life for Expeto, and we believe our platform will continue to unlock new opportunities to reduce energy usage and the net carbon footprint of our customer’s operations. Join us - #Nextworking.', 'Collaborate with the development team to ensure development guidelines and methodologies are followed and continuously improved.', 'Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.', 'Architect, design, and implement key technologies into the product offering.Collaborate with the development team to ensure development guidelines and methodologies are followed and continuously improved.Collaborate with Product Management to ensure that the implementation is in accordance with the requirements and that the features meet expectations.Work with prospects and customers to deploy and support installations around the world.', 'Expeto is an equal opportunity employer. Should you require accommodation in any aspect of our selection process, please contact our recruitment team at careers (at) expeto (dot) io.', 'Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.', 'At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).', 'Work with prospects and customers to deploy and support installations around the world.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.', 'In order to be considered you must have:', 'Architect, design, and implement key technologies into the product offering.', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to perform a wide variety of diversified software development tasks ranging from architecture, design, and implementation; to helping customers troubleshoot systems. This requires an in-depth understanding of the technology stack, application of agile methodologies, and attention to detail.', 'remote', 'Key responsibilities include:', 'Why Expeto?', 'This will be a\xa0remote\xa0position, however, it is preferable that you are located in the MST or PST.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.', 'Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'Our people come first because it is their commitment and passion that makes the difference in everything we do. We are a growing distributed team with a culture of collaboration, and a focus on creating the best end-to-end customer experience possible. We trust each other and rely on a leader rich organization in which people are expected to wear many hats and step up when they see a problem that needs to be solved. We are great communicators and appreciate perfect candor and the frank dialog necessary to keep us true to our vision and delivering on our mission.']

['', 'React/Redux/Saga', "We've always had multiple locations so working/collaborating remotely has always been a\xa0part of our DNA.\xa0Like many others, since the global pandemic hit, we've transitioned our physical offices to everyone working from home for at least the next 6-9 months. We've found that it has not affected our productivity and have become more remote oriented as a result.", 'Paid holidays', 'Our Culture and Core Values', 'You communicate well', 'Groove is committed to ensuring the security and protection of the personal information that we process, and to provide a compliant and consistent approach to data protection. All submitted resumes, regardless of location, will be deleted after 1 year.', 'Qualifications:', "4+ years of experience; at least 2 in either Ruby on Rails and/or React/Redux are a major plusYou value writing tests, pairing, and making an impact on end usersYou enjoy white-boarding data models and workflows with othersYou've built and supported things that operate in production and at scaleYou seek the best solution given real life constraints - not the best academic answer.You communicate wellYou take initiative and ownership by identifying issues and fixing them or communicating them with the team without being askedYou're comfortable with modern front end frameworks like React/ReduxYou're intellectually curiousYou're passionate about building technology to help the workflows of a historically neglected user-base", 'Groove is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. We offer highly competitive compensation packages and excellent benefits, including medical/dental/vision insurance, flexible PTO, and a\xa0matching 401K.\xa0', "We're looking for awesome, well rounded engineers who want to take on big challenges, collaborate closely with others, grow a lot, and help shape the future of the company.\xa0You will have a direct influence on product and technology decisions and help define our culture as we change how companies and teams sell.", '4+ years of experience; at least 2 in either Ruby on Rails and/or React/Redux are a major plus', 'You take initiative and ownership by identifying issues and fixing them or communicating them with the team without being asked', "We serve some of the most historically underserved users, many of whom have been stuck using unintuitive and clunky software for their whole careers. It's not uncommon that users spend 4-6 hours+ a day using and interacting with Groove. Our goal is to elevate the user and the work they can do.", 'You enjoy white-boarding data models and workflows with others', '401k match', "You're passionate about building technology to help the workflows of a historically neglected user-base", 'Tech Stack', 'Medical/dental/vision insurance', 'Our values speak volumes about who we are, both as individuals and as a team. At Groove, we put our team before ourselves and are dedicated to ensuring that our teammates are happy and satisfied, both in their careers and their work environment. We are a team of high-performers that operate in a culture of empathy and transparency, with a natural curiosity to continually grow. We put the team before ourselves, care more and enjoy the journey above all else. These are only a few of the reasons that we have a five-star rating on Glassdoor.\xa0\xa0', 'Fun, collaborative, and balanced culture ', "This specific role is one of the first fully remote positions and we're excited to see what new talent we can bring into Groove from new locations in Canada and the US!", 'Flexible PTO', 'A note about remote work / COVID19\xa0-\xa0', "You're comfortable with modern front end frameworks like React/Redux", 'Groove is the leading sales engagement platform for enterprises using Salesforce, specializing in ease-of-use, ease-of-administration, and cross-team collaboration. Built for the needs of full-cycle sellers, Groove automates non-sales activities so that pre- and post-sales reps can spend more time building relationships and generating revenue. On average, Groove gives revenue teams 20% of their time back to focus on higher-value activities. Groove’s Salesforce-native architecture ensures more accurate reporting and forecasting, lower compliance risk with global privacy laws, and streamlined administration.\xa0', 'A stocked kitchen and cold brew and kombucha on tap', "You've built and supported things that operate in production and at scale", 'GraphQL', 'Life Insurance', "Our engineering organization is split into product based squads. You'll be joining one of these squads and working most closely with each engineer and product manager within the squad.", 'Chrome Extensions / Salesforce APEX', 'Ruby on RailsReact/Redux/SagaGraphQLPostgres/Redis/FirestoreChrome Extensions / Salesforce APEX', 'Groove was named one of\xa0 Inc. This role will be remote to start, but will transition to office with some remote post pandemic.']

Advocate and guide others about high quality software and the practices needed to achieve that. Experience with documenting and doing demos to help with adoption of tools. ', ' Build a system to fast forward a loan file to any point in the loan process which will help the operations and test teams do more effective training and testing Build more effective micro service testing using contracts or api tooling which can be shared across multiple engineering teams Improve our CI pipelines that run thousands of tests across hundreds of thousands of lines of code in a few minutes (with about 85% coverage) Determine a way to triage potentially flaky tests, such as, creating build monitors, failing test notifications, automatic detection of the change that could cause the test to become flaky, and automatic quarantine of tests Partner with the SRE team on monitoring, observability and alerting to improve Mean Time to Detect, Mean Time To Repair, and Uptime. For further information on how we collect data of job applicants, please click here. As an engineer at Code42 you'll be working on challenging problems in scalability, security, and new feature development. You might be a good fit if you enjoy participating in or leading design sessions in front of a whiteboard, implementing a pragmatic solution to a sticky problem, or digging into a stack trace from a failed test. We have a casual and collaborative work atmosphere where everyone’s opinions and ideas are valued.", 'In the race for ideas, we never want our customers to compromise the speed of innovation nor the safety of their data. Code42 provides protection from Insider Threat by delivering a fast, simple path to data loss detection, investigation and response. With our product, security teams easily protect corporate data and reduce insider risk while fostering an open and collaborative culture for employees. We are proud our insider threat solution has been honored with a number of national awards in 2019. This includes Globee, IT World, Black Unicorn and Stevie Awards, as well as Cyber Defense Magazine InfoSec Awards, Cybersecurity Excellence Awards and an Info Security PG’s Global Excellence Award.', 'Synthesizing requirements into cohesive designs, identifying gaps and contradictions.']

['', '3+ years of experience in testing web applications, back end services and databases.', 'Mindstrong is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer that celebrates diversity. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants. All individuals seeking employment at Mindstrong are considered without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment. Mindstrong also strives for a safe and robust workplace and prohibits harassment of any kind. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation for interviewing, please let us know by emailing us at recruiting@mindstronghealth.com.\xa0', 'You are familiar with web and REST API testing and have programming experience in Java, Ruby or Python.', 'Who you are:', 'Our ideal candidate is a bright and motivated Engineer who is excited about shipping quality products and\xa0eager to apply their experience with manual and automated testing. This is a great opportunity for someone who wants to learn and grow as they are contributing to the quality of our products.', 'Mindstrong has offices in Mountain View, CA and San Francisco, CA but candidates for this position can be located anywhere in the US.\xa0', 'B.S. in Computer Science or related field OR equivalent experience', 'Working knowledge of Cloud technologies (AWS EC2, Docker) is a plus', 'We’d love to talk more!', 'Experience with CI/CD (Jenkins, TeamCity, Bamboo, Fastlane etc.) is a plus', 'Strong communicator (oral and written)', 'Join us in our journey to transform the future of brain health!', 'You feel good about your work knowing that what you do will affect the lives of millions of people around the world', 'Working knowledge of no-sql databases such as MongoDB is a huge plus.', 'As a Series C company, we have a blend of science, technology, and healthcare talent to help us unlock this paradigm-shifting approach, including the likes of National Institute for Mental Health, Stanford Center for Neurobiological Imaging, Uber, Facebook, Google, Apple, Oscar Health, and CMS.', 'Manage multiple priorities and tasks in a dynamic work environment', 'Entrepreneurial and eager to thrive in a startup environment', 'A good person, highly ethical and accepting of others', 'Conducting manual testing of Care Web application and its interaction with backend microservices and nosql databases.', 'Our Caseworks provide care using the Care Web application. We are looking for a stellar and passionate Senior Software Engineer in Test to perform manual and automation testing of our Care Web application and its interaction with backend microservices and nosql databases to ensure correct functionality. In this role you will actively participate in manual testing, writing automated tests and application troubleshooting. You will need to understand how the web application uses backend services to deliver its functionality. You will use this understanding to set up specific test scenarios, to automate these scenarios and to help identify the root cause of defects.\xa0\xa0', 'Writing new test cases or modifying existing to cover new or changed functionalityDefining test requirements, test strategies and test designsConducting manual testing of Care Web application and its interaction with backend microservices and nosql databases.Write End to End automated tests for Web app and REST services.\xa0Manage multiple priorities and tasks in a dynamic work environment', 'Who is Mindstrong?', '\xa0', 'Your background and skills:', 'Delivering quality products across a wide range of running environments excites you', 'You feel good about your work knowing that what you do will affect the lives of millions of people around the worldEntrepreneurial and eager to thrive in a startup environmentStrong communicator (oral and written)A good person, highly ethical and accepting of others', 'What is the Senior Software Engineer in Test role?', 'Write End to End automated tests for Web app and REST services.\xa0', 'You use judgment in selecting methods, techniques and evaluation criteria for successful results', 'You are familiar with Front End automation frameworks such as Selenium, Cypress and REST API automation frameworks such as REST Assured.', "What you'll be doing:", 'Mindstrong is a research-driven, consumer-focused mental healthcare company working to unlock a new virtual care model for delivering healthcare to people living with a serious mental illness (SMI) through innovations in measurement science, and care delivery. job_title: Senior Software Engineer in Artificial Intelligence
job_text: ['\xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems ', '\xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ', "\xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field ", '\xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java ', "You'll need to have:", '\xa05+ years of software development experience ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) \xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills \xa0Experience designing and using relational databases \xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems \xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code \xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients \xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'Help us improve our low-latency, high-volume pipeline, which carries two million news stories and half a billion tweets daily. You will integrate new functionality, such as supporting more document formats and publishing the output of our AI systems to more downstream listeners. You will improve the speed and reliability of the existing pipeline. ', '\xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills ', "We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join our rapidly growing Artificial Intelligence team.\xa0News and social media move financial markets.\xa0 We are one of the largest producers of news in the world and ingests over 70,000 external news feeds and social media like Twitter each day. This data keeps our clients informed, and our team's insights help make sense of it for our customers. ", 'New York, NY - USA', "We'd love to see:", '\xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) ', 'Who are we?', 'Our Artificial Intelligence (AI) group: researchers and engineers who have a passion for solving complex problems. Our charter: to extract relevant, meaningful, tradable, and actionable information (pricings, earnings, recommendations and major events) from data (news, web, social media, and structured data) in real-time. Since our customers rely on this information to make swift financial decisions, we guarantee precision, accuracy and latency beyond most academic and industry standards. ', '\xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing ', "We'll trust you to:", "\xa05+ years of software development experience \xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field \xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them \xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing \xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java \xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN \xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ", ' ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code ', 'Who are you?', '\xa0Experience designing and using relational databases ', '\xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence ', '\xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'New York, NY - USA ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence', 'A strong software engineer who enjoys building and improving complex, large-scale systems. You like writing testable and maintainable code. You are autonomous: you know whether your time is best spent thinking about the architecture or writing a tool that helps you get the job done. You want to join a close-knit group and make a big impact. ']

company: MCS Group | Your Specialist Recruitment Consultancy
job_text: ['', 'Previous experience working in an agile environment', 'You will be joining an established company who have been in the industry for close to 20 years and operate offices in global locations. While this is a company with vast experience, they retain a culture that you would experience in a start up. They continuously review their tech stack and leverage cutting edge technology to deliver world class software products to their customers. ', 'The Package', 'You will have 3+ years experience in commercial development', 'Experience with SaaS and cloud-based platform development, such as AWS.', 'You will have 3+ years experience in commercial developmentHave strong experience in Java/ Javascript \xa0(Spring/React)Have a passion to create high quality codeExperience with SaaS and cloud-based platform development, such as AWS.Previous experience working in an agile environment', '\xa0', 'This is not a remote role. There will be remote aspects, but the person will be needed on site at times.', 'The Person', 'MCS are seeking to connect with talented Full stack Engineers (Java/Javascript) for our client in Boston. The successful candidate will bring with them 3+ years commercial experience in Spring/React and play a key member of this team. This global company has big growth plans for 2021 which makes it an exciting time to join. ', 'To speak in absolute confidence about this opportunity please send an up to date CV via the link provided or contact Paula McCalmont, Service Delivery Consultant at MCS Group p.mccalmont@mcsgroup.jobs', 'Up to $130,000 salary depending on experience plus a generous benefits package. Also flexible working with the ability to attend the office on occasion rather than every day.\xa0', 'Have a passion to create high quality code', 'Have strong experience in Java/ Javascript \xa0(Spring/React)', 'This role is full time. US Citizens or Green Card. No sponsorship. ']

['', 'Collaborating with teammates across the product development organization.', "Typically has a bachelor's degree and 5+ years professional experience, or can convincingly demonstrate this level of skill.", 'Is comfortable taking ownership of deliverables as part of a team.', 'THE ROLE:', 'Advanced object -oriented development of multi-tier architectures', 'Is familiar with continuous integration and deployment concepts.', "Writing unit and integration tests for your team's code.", 'Is experienced with agile/lean development processes', 'Advanced in the primary languages of the team (typically a combination of Java, C#, C/C++, JavaScript)', 'Experienced with testing frameworks used by the team', 'Demoing progress on team deliverables.', 'Participating in story mapping and supportability, and testability.', 'Has a passion for building systems that work well.', 'Acquiring new skills and knowledge to share with the team', "Designing and implementing code for assigned projects, both independently and with teammates, taking into account needs for monitoring, supportability, and testability.Writing unit and integration tests for your team's code.Testing, debugging, and troubleshooting all across the Code42 technology stack.Documenting code and design, and reviewing code and design docs from others.Demoing progress on team deliverables.Participating in story mapping and sizing sessions for small to medium-size product features.Synthesizing requirements into cohesive designs, identifying gaps and contradictions.Helping to estimate and prioritize product team design discussions and code reviews, asking questions, contributing and accepting feedback.Acquiring new skills and knowledge to share with the team", 'WHY #BECODE42:', 'Is comfortable working with non-technical staff.', "Provide real-world examples of production-quality work you've done in the past", 'Are active in the local tech community', 'Helping to mentor and guide more junior staff.', 'WHAT YOU BRING:', 'Have contributed to open-source software in the past', '\xa0', 'A first-class onboarding experience which includes professional development, personal development all while learning and living our Code42 values. We provide comprehensive benefits that include health, dental, vision, wellness, 401k, maternity/paternity leave, generous paid time off and volunteer opportunities. At Code42 everyone is an owner. We participate in a commission or bonus plans and all receive stock options. We win together.', 'PREFERRED:', 'Leading team design discussions and code reviews, asking questions, contributing and accepting feedback.', 'WHAT YOU’LL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:\xa0', 'Helping to estimate and prioritize product backlog.', 'Contributing to process improvement efforts within engineering.', 'Have experience with some additional languages (any of the above list, as well as languages like Gradle, Kotlin, Shell Scripting, CI systems like Jenkins / Concourse, or Python)', 'Testing, debugging, and troubleshooting all across the Code42 technology stack.', 'Documenting code and design, and reviewing code and design docs from others.', 'You belong at Code42 if you crave being a part of a transparent and collaborative culture, you want to drive innovation, and security is always top of mind. We look for authentic people who are inquisitive, enjoy solving complex problems, think creatively and provide diverse insights to help us think differently and thrive together. Don’t wait. #BeCode42.', "Have experience with some additional languages (any of the above list, as well as languages like Gradle, Kotlin, Shell Scripting, CI systems like Jenkins / Concourse, or Python)Have experience or understanding of event sourcing or CQRSProvide real-world examples of production-quality work you've done in the pastAre active in the local tech communityHave contributed to open-source software in the past", 'Clearly able to communicate technical ideas to peers in written and verbal form', "Typically has a bachelor's degree and 5+ years professional experience, or can convincingly demonstrate this level of skill.Advanced in the primary languages of the team (typically a combination of Java, C#, C/C++, JavaScript)Advanced object -oriented development of multi-tier architecturesExperienced with testing frameworks used by the teamIs familiar with continuous integration and deployment concepts.Practical experience with data repository technologies (ie: relational databases, Elasticsearch, NoSQL)Is experienced with agile/lean development processesIs comfortable taking ownership of deliverables as part of a team.Is comfortable working in a collaborative environment, both offering and asking for help when it's needed.Is comfortable working with non-technical staff.Has a passion for building systems that work well.Clearly able to communicate technical ideas to peers in written and verbal formArticulate business impact of technical decisions to non-technical staff", 'Articulate business impact of technical decisions to non-technical staff', "Is comfortable working in a collaborative environment, both offering and asking for help when it's needed.", 'Have experience or understanding of event sourcing or CQRS', 'Practical experience with data repository technologies (ie: relational databases, Elasticsearch, NoSQL)', "Code42 is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing team, focusing on back end server side development. We're looking for people with a passion for world-class software development who understand the importance of maintainable code and comprehensive tests, and who will help Code42 protect and secure our customers' data. As an engineer at Code42 you'll be working on challenging problems in scalability, security, and new feature development. You might be a good fit if you enjoy participating in or leading design sessions in front of a whiteboard, implementing a pragmatic solution to a sticky problem, or digging into a stack trace from a failed test. We have a casual and collaborative work atmosphere where everyone’s opinions and ideas are valued.", 'In the race for ideas, we never want our customers to compromise the speed of innovation nor the safety of their data. Code42 provides protection from Insider Threat by delivering a fast, simple path to data loss detection, investigation and response. With our product, security teams easily protect corporate data and reduce insider risk while fostering an open and collaborative culture for employees. We are proud our insider threat solution has been honored with a number of national awards in 2019. This includes Globee, IT World, Black Unicorn and Stevie Awards, as well as Cyber Defense Magazine InfoSec Awards, Cybersecurity Excellence Awards and an Info Security PG’s Global Excellence Award.', 'Synthesizing requirements into cohesive designs, identifying gaps and contradictions.']

job_title: Remote Senior Software Engineer - Data Services
job_text: ['', 'Write clean, testable, scalable code in multiple languages both compiled and interpreted depending on the application needs', 'Work with other technical team members to establish and maintain our build and release process.', 'Bias towards action over discussion.', 'Experience in designing robust, scalable, resilient, cloud-based solutions', 'Understand long term business plans and design a future state enterprise data service architecture roadmap.Write clean, testable, scalable code in multiple languages both compiled and interpreted depending on the application needsProvide technical leadership and guidance throughout the data services software development lifecycle.Directly engage and collaborate with teams such as Native Applications Development, Backend API Development, and DevOps to identify new technologies, architectures, solutions and processesProvide technical oversight throughout the entire scope of a project - ideation, development, testing, deployment, and monitoring process - to ensure solutions align with long-term architectural direction.Recommend changes in development, maintenance and system standards.Work with other technical team members to establish and maintain our build and release process.Demonstrate knowledge and proficiency in system design, object-oriented programming, data modeling, algorithms, cloud based micro-service oriented architecture, containerization, lambda functions, user permissions models, content deliveryTake the lead to incorporate industry best practices for our developers and products.Other duties as appropriate - assigned from time to time.', 'Understanding of Agile, Scrum, or Kanban methodology and process', 'Recommend changes in development, maintenance and system standards.', 'Experience with fintech or adtech a plus', 'Experience writing data services in an interpreted language such as Ruby, Python, or PHP', 'Experience in moving application architectures from startup to mature.', 'Experience with a relational database and strong SQL fundamentals', 'A Bit About Us', 'Take the lead to incorporate industry best practices for our developers and products.', 'Strong analytical, critical thinking, and problem solving skills.', 'Provide technical leadership and guidance throughout the data services software development lifecycle.', 'Experience in both process and solution analysis & design.', 'Exceptional Algorithms fundamentals', 'Able to work independently in a dynamic project environment with aggressive deadlines.', 'Experience writing data services in a compiled language such as Java, Scala, Go, Kotlin, or Swift', 'Come join a well funded start up with a proven leadership team', 'Exceptional Data Structures and Data Modeling fundamentals', 'Comfortable communicating in both written and oral forms to various types of audiences (developers to managers to business owners).', 'Exceptional Object-Oriented Programming fundamentals', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience5+ years of relevant experience in software developmentExceptional Object-Oriented Programming fundamentalsExceptional Data Structures and Data Modeling fundamentalsExceptional Algorithms fundamentalsExperience writing data services in a compiled language such as Java, Scala, Go, Kotlin, or SwiftExperience writing data services in an interpreted language such as Ruby, Python, or PHPExperience with a relational database and strong SQL fundamentalsExperience with search / discovery information retrieval systems such as elastic search or solrExperience with event driven programming - Kafka, KinesisExperience in designing robust, scalable, resilient, cloud-based solutionsUnderstanding of Agile, Scrum, or Kanban methodology and processExperience with fintech or adtech a plusExperience in moving application architectures from startup to mature.Bias towards action over discussion.Strong analytical, critical thinking, and problem solving skills.Experience in both process and solution analysis & design.Comfortable communicating in both written and oral forms to various types of audiences (developers to managers to business owners).Able to work independently in a dynamic project environment with aggressive deadlines.Experience working with geographically dispersed teams.", 'Other duties as appropriate - assigned from time to time.', 'Provide technical oversight throughout the entire scope of a project - ideation, development, testing, deployment, and monitoring process - to ensure solutions align with long-term architectural direction.', 'Directly engage and collaborate with teams such as Native Applications Development, Backend API Development, and DevOps to identify new technologies, architectures, solutions and processes', '5+ years of relevant experience in software development', 'Experience with search / discovery information retrieval systems such as elastic search or solr', 'Experience working with geographically dispersed teams.', 'Why join us?', 'Experience with event driven programming - Kafka, Kinesis', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience", 'Job Details', 'Understand long term business plans and design a future state enterprise data service architecture roadmap.', 'Demonstrate knowledge and proficiency in system design, object-oriented programming, data modeling, algorithms, cloud based micro-service oriented architecture, containerization, lambda functions, user permissions models, content delivery']

['', 'Make a difference', 'In this environment the Software Engineer is developing working, tested code based on proven Lean/Agile methods.', 'The SDE team seeks a Software Engineer to help bring to life new products meant to enhance the software development ecosystems leveraged by teams within that develop software themselves.In this environment the Software Engineer is developing working, tested code based on proven Lean/Agile methods.Engineers on the team work across the full stack of technologies to enable the highest priority work to be delivered.', 'Embrace emerging technologies, create inventive solutions and meet intriguing client challenges. Be a part of something bigger working on teams that make a difference and transform business.', 'Practiced in Software Development Lifecycle concepts and DevOps; experienced with automation tools, development of CI / CD pipelines and principles of the 12 factor appExceptional software engineering knowledge; OO Design PrinciplesExperience with Spring Cloud and deploying to cloud platforms; Pivotal Cloud FoundryHighly effective in working with other technical experts, Product Managers, UI/UX Designers and business stakeholdersDelivered products that include web front-end development; JavaScript, frameworks like Angular, React, etc.Capable in Continuous Integration using tools and pipelines such as Jenkins.Using a build and dependency management tool for building, storing, and deploying application versions to the cloud such as Gradle, NPM, or Maven.', 'The SDE team seeks a Software Engineer to help bring to life new products meant to enhance the software development ecosystems leveraged by teams within that develop software themselves.', 'API development/design', 'Capable in Continuous Integration using tools and pipelines such as Jenkins.', 'Skills Required:', '*Please note: Candidates must be able to work on W-2. Candidates will need to take and pass a HackerRank coding assessment test to be considered. We cannot consider 3rd party or C2C candidates for this role.*', 'Experience Preferred:', 'Make a difference ', 'Java/KotlinAPI development/designExceptional software engineering knowledge; OO Design Principles', 'Move ahead', 'At Ciber Global our consultants have access to a comprehensive benefits package.\xa0Benefits can include Paid-Time-Off, Paid Holidays, 401K matching, Life and Accidental Death Insurance, Short & Long Term\xa0Disability Insurance,\xa0and a variety of other perks.', "No matter where you are in your career, you can work to move to the next level. You'll work hand in hand with top-tier talent and be part of a team focused on the technologies that lead the way to exciting technological changes.\xa0\xa0", 'Engineers on the team work across the full stack of technologies to enable the highest priority work to be delivered.', 'Highly effective in working with other technical experts, Product Managers, UI/UX Designers and business stakeholders', 'Ciber Global is an Equal Opportunity Employer Minorities/Females/Gender Identity/Sexual Orientation/Protected Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities.', 'Experience with Spring Cloud and deploying to cloud platforms; Pivotal Cloud Foundry', 'Java/Kotlin', 'Education Required:', 'Practiced in Software Development Lifecycle concepts and DevOps; experienced with automation tools, development of CI / CD pipelines and principles of the 12 factor app', '\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, or similar discipline', 'Delivered products that include web front-end development; JavaScript, frameworks like Angular, React, etc.', ' ', 'Using a build and dependency management tool for building, storing, and deploying application versions to the cloud such as Gradle, NPM, or Maven.', 'Find a purpose', 'Exceptional software engineering knowledge; OO Design Principles', "Ciber Global wants you. Come build new things with us and advance your career.\xa0At Ciber Global you'll collaborate with experts.\xa0You'll join successful teams contributing to our clients' success.\xa0You'll work side by side with our clients and have long-term opportunities to advance your career with the latest emerging technologies."]

Ability to respond to common inquiries or complaints from customers, regulatory agencies, or members of the business community. Experienced and proficient in the use of standard personal computer software tools; including word processors, spreadsheets, presentation graphics and databases.Ability to define problems, collect data, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions.', 'Perform integration test, acceptance test, and delivery of software imbedded products.']

', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Present progress reports to stakeholders ', 'The person', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Enforce strict compliance and security requirements informed by our customers and best practices ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Mentor junior developers ', 'Senior Software Engineer ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Connect and create APIs to enable technical support with tools that quicken the time to resolve issues that arise at various stages of the data pipeline ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with data stores and data-related open source tools (Kafka required) ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with financial data sets ', 'You have a positive attitude and embody a balance of cautiousness, that serious software engineering requires, and pushing the envelope, which a startup needs to do. You are an excellent team player and aim to bring out the best in those around you. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience integrating outside services into a data pipeline ', 'Salary/Benefits/Equity', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Build connectors to a wide array of data sources guided by advanced data integration patterns ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Extend capabilities of open source data tools to provide added functionality for scalability, responsiveness, orchestration, and monitoring ', 'The opportunity', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with Linux, relational databases ', 'Job description', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 BS degree or above in Computer Science, Engineering, Math, Physics or related fields ', 'Senior Software Engineer', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience maintaining client and vendor relationship a plus ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Build a monitoring system that handles a variety of specific business logic ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with integration platforms like Talend, Pentaho highly preferred ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop systems to manage and make use of meta data generated in the data ingestion process ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work with data analysts to integrate configuration schemas into system processes ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Build a data validation and error handling system based on requirements from investment process ', 'Job description ', 'Technically, you will be one of the principals responsible for architecting and building a new platform by leveraging a wide variety of technologies and services, including cloud providers like AWS. You will deliver a solution capable of processing large volumes of heterogenous data, to provide analytics and insights to aid with research, investment and operations. ', 'Requirements', 'This position will offer an attractive salary, a substantial stock grant, and a significant upside in terms of career growth and influence. For the right person, this is a once in a lifetime opportunity. ', 'Salary/Benefits/Equity ', 'The opportunity ', ' ', 'The person ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Excellent verbal/written communications ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Demonstrated record of meeting deadlines ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience building a data pipeline, and experience with ETL highly preferred ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 At least 3 years of professional experience programming in Java, Python, or other OOP languages ', 'We offer a competitive salary, 401(k) and benefits. You will also receive an equity stake in the company. You will have a flexible work environment with the freedom and resources to do your best work.', 'We are seeking a rare kind of individual, who can zoom out to the big picture, both from a technical architecture, and from a technical strategy perspective, and zoom in to details of the implementation while fussing over the code quality, hygiene, and maintainability. You will be one of the key team members responsible for setting standards, culture, mentorship of other team members, and shipping high quality solutions. You aim to bring clarity and energy to the team, and to your work environment. ', 'Requirements ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Previous work with AWS ecosystem ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Previous work with Kibana, Logstash, and Elasticsearch a plus ', 'Location ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 At least 2 years of software project management experience ', 'Our Data Engineering firm was formed by an experienced management team, with successful prior exits, and backed by a few of the world’s largest hedge funds, to solve some of the most challenging problems in data analytics and data-driven insights. Because of our strong backers, who are both investors and potential customers, we are well funded and able to build exciting solutions with full collaboration from our intended end users – a privileged position to be in, where you will enjoy the best of the startup life and stability uncommon for ordinary startups. ']

['', ' Expert level understanding of Java   ', 'About ThousandEyes ', 'About ThousandEyes', '6+ years of software development experience A fast learner Comfortable working with newer technologies  Expert level understanding of Java   Excellent object-oriented design skills Experience with streaming architectures, in particular Kafka Experience in open-source development is a plus Experience with network protocols is a plus Strong Computer Science fundamentals Bachelors degree in Computer Science or similar', 'Excellent object-oriented design skills ', '6+ years of software development experience ', 'Strong Computer Science fundamentals ', 'Experience with network protocols is a plus ', 'Learn more about engineering at ThousandEyes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9a_c8yJyzc', 'A fast learner ', 'At ThousandEyes, we use cutting-edge technologies and innovative techniques to study and visualize networks on a global scale.ThousandEyes engineers are focused on continuous improvement -- of our product, our codebase, our knowledge, and our skills. We believe in innovation, simplicity, and elegance. We work in small, cross-functional teams where everyone has a voice. ', 'Experience with streaming architectures, in particular Kafka ', 'Engineering at ThousandEyes', 'Experience in open-source development is a plus ', 'Engineering at ThousandEyes ', 'The goal of the Cloud and Enterprise Agent team is to provide a real-time network monitoring platform that measures, correlates, and visualizes synthetic data about global network conditions. This data allows our customers to gather performance metrics about network services and servers that they depend on and make informed decisions about how to take action should something go wrong. As a Senior Software Engineer on this team, you will be helping to address our two main challenges: keeping up with the ever-increasing amount of data gathered by our agents, and making this information more actionable for our customers. ', "What we're looking for: ", ' ', 'About the Role', "What we're looking for:", 'Bachelors degree in Computer Science or similar', 'About the Role ', 'Learn more about engineering at ThousandEyes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9a_c8yJyzc ', 'The name ThousandEyes was born from two big ideas: the power to see things not ordinarily possible and the ability to collect insights from a multitude of vantage points. As organizations rely more on cloud services and the Internet, the network has become a "black box" outside of their control. ThousandEyes gives organizations visibility and insight into the now borderless network. It arms them with an accurate understanding of how the network impacts their applications, users and customers. ThousandEyes is used by some of the world\'s largest and fastest growing brands, including 4 of the top 5 SaaS companies, 4 of the top 5 US banks and 3 of the Fortune 5. ThousandEyes is backed by Sequoia Capital, Google Ventures, Tenaya Capital and Sutter Hill Ventures, with headquarters in San Francisco, CA. ', 'Comfortable working with newer technologies ']

['AWS or GCP', 'About you:', 'Elastic, Solr, Lucene querying and optimization', 'Additionally, you have experience in at least a few of the following areas:', 'CI/CD with Jenkins', 'Containerized workloads running in production, ideally with K8s. SDN plugins experience is a plus', 'Terraform, Ansible, CloudFormation\xa0', 'You are a candidate with a proven track record of building scalable data processing applications. Specifically, you have:', 'Unit, integration, acceptance, and performance testingCI/CD with JenkinsElastic, Solr, Lucene querying and optimizationContainerized workloads running in production, ideally with K8s. SDN plugins experience is a plusLogging/Metrics in distributed applications, for example ELK, Prometheus, and GrafanaAWS or GCPTerraform, Ansible, CloudFormation\xa0', '5+ years of relevant software engineering experience', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science', 'Clarabridge supports your autonomy, independence, and growth. As a purely commercial firm, there are no timecards or clearances, and we offer unlimited PTO and flexible work arrangements. Professional development opportunities include conference travel and dedicated time for independent projects. Perks include free coffee, sodas, and snacks, a pool table, waffle Fridays, a gym, and proximity to the Wiehle Avenue Metro station. Finally, as a member of an engineering team at a medium-size company, you will be able to have significant direct impact on technology and customers and will help shape the direction of our product at Clarabridge.', 'About the team:', '\xa0', '3+ years of active and recent Java+Spring experience (other languages and frameworks are a bonus)', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science5+ years of relevant software engineering experience3+ years of active and recent Java+Spring experience (other languages and frameworks are a bonus)', 'About the role:', 'Logging/Metrics in distributed applications, for example ELK, Prometheus, and Grafana', 'We are a scrum shop and happy to teach and mentor if you don’t have previous scrum experience.\xa0If you do have scrum experience, then you’ll be happy to know that we do full scrum, complete with sprint planning, review, retrospectives, daily scrums, backlog refinement, and planning poker. We also embrace XP development methodologies and put great value on XP development principles.', 'As a Senior Software Engineer on the Clarabridge Platform scrum development team, you will be collaborating with other progressive engineers to\xa0bring our software to the next levels of scalability, performance, security, and functionality.\xa0This stack processes very large amounts of data using a variety of open-source technologies such as Java, Elastic, Kafka, Spring, Docker, Kubernetes, Postgres, Jenkins, Ansible, and others.\xa0In this role there is lots of opportunity for growth - you will start with responsibility for both story-level and epic-level work, and broaden out from there.\xa0As with all of our engineering roles, you will have influence on design and implementation and will be able to both mentor and be mentored.', 'About us:', 'Unit, integration, acceptance, and performance testing']

['', 'Qualifications', 'Responsibilities', 'These Requirements Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following Specialized Security Screenings', 'Microsoft Cloud Background Check', "We'd Love To Talk To You, If You", 'Required Qualifications', "A bac <![CDATA[ PRINCIPAL PROGRAM MANAGER LEADDo you have a passion for making developers across Microsoft more productive? Do you love the gratification of helping someone in Microsoft deliver great products? Do you love learning how the leading tech companies make their developers more productive? Want to build and evolve the tools and tech that enable developers to build, test, and deploy in minutes? If so, and you’d like to do this across 6,000+ engineers, come join the Cosine Developer Productivity team!As a part of the Microsoft Cloud + AI division, the COSINE (Core Operating System & Intelligent Edge) organization delivers technologies and solutions for the Operating System platform foundation across Microsoft’s product lines. Whether it’s to power the 1+ Billion Windows 10 devices running in homes and businesses worldwide or to fueling the growth of highly scalable Azure Cloud and Windows Servers - we are the platform engine, critical in accomplishing the mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more!ResponsibilitiesOur team helps Developers creating Windows to be more productive by providing them services, tools and guidance. We are a fun tightly nit team who are super passionate about what we do and how we come together as team to do it. We deeply recognize that our team has one of the most leveraged Jobs at Microsoft. Small improvements in productivity of developers enable Microsoft in deliver far more valuable products to the Billion+ customers of ours, and we build on each others’ ideas to generate creative and novel ways to achieve our goals.We’re looking for a strong Principal PM Lead who cares deeply about the culture of the feature team to create the best ideas together… someone who is passionate about engaging with customers to know their needs well and comfortable in the use of data to make decisions.We'd Love To Talk To You, If YouAre a passionate problem solver, who continuously strives to make things betterEnjoy wearing multiple hats and digging in to make things happenAre equally comfortable articulating the big picture and refining the small details of a designAre customer and data obsessed, always learning, and refining your features to deliver maximum business impactLove pushing for clarity in communication and can explain large, complex systems, in simple-straightforward languageHave a strong drive to take a broad view on platform, thinking not only about the traditional topics of code and tools, but also in culture and needs of Developers.Know how to balance passion and opinion with being a great team playerRequired QualificationsYou have 3+ years of people management experienceYou are a genuine self-starter, who proactively identifies problems, proposes solutions and drives a team to address themYou are open-minded and continuously searching for “Why” behind the data being reported/observedYou are a change agent driving cultural change of your teamYou are strong technically, with a track record of successfully designing and delivering solutions for complex technical problemsA bachelor’s degree in Engineering or equivalent discipline required10+ years of experience designing and shipping high-quality software productsStrong written/verbal communication skillsThese Requirements Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following Specialized Security ScreeningsAbility to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role.Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.#ES3Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work."]
