['', 'Collaborate with Product Management to ensure that the implementation is in accordance with the requirements and that the features meet expectations.', 'Expeto was founded on a simple, yet compelling principle - enable meaningful IoT outcomes by transforming traditional mobile network complexity into IT simplicity. Expeto integrates mobile networks and IoT applications onto a single platform specifically designed for enterprise use cases and is sold as a service leveraging modern cloud and edge computing resources. Expeto believes that harnessing data from connected devices around the world will unlock insights that shape business strategy, create new revenue opportunities, and help companies make better, more informed decisions to ensure a sustainable future.', 'Sustainability and efficiency are a way of life for Expeto, and we believe our platform will continue to unlock new opportunities to reduce energy usage and the net carbon footprint of our customer’s operations. Join us - #Nextworking.', 'Collaborate with the development team to ensure development guidelines and methodologies are followed and continuously improved.', 'Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.', 'Architect, design, and implement key technologies into the product offering.Collaborate with the development team to ensure development guidelines and methodologies are followed and continuously improved.Collaborate with Product Management to ensure that the implementation is in accordance with the requirements and that the features meet expectations.Work with prospects and customers to deploy and support installations around the world.', 'Expeto is an equal opportunity employer. Should you require accommodation in any aspect of our selection process, please contact our recruitment team at careers (at) expeto (dot) io.', 'Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.', 'At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).', 'Work with prospects and customers to deploy and support installations around the world.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.', 'In order to be considered you must have:', 'Architect, design, and implement key technologies into the product offering.', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to perform a wide variety of diversified software development tasks ranging from architecture, design, and implementation; to helping customers troubleshoot systems. This requires an in-depth understanding of the technology stack, application of agile methodologies, and attention to detail.', 'remote', 'Key responsibilities include:', 'Why Expeto?', 'Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.', 'Our people come first because it is their commitment and passion that makes the difference in everything we do. We are a growing distributed team with a culture of collaboration, and a focus on creating the best end-to-end customer experience possible. We trust each other and rely on a leader rich organization in which people are expected to wear many hats and step up when they see a problem that needs to be solved. We are great communicators and appreciate perfect candor and the frank dialog necessary to keep us true to our vision and delivering on our mission.', 'This will be a\xa0remote\xa0position, however, it is preferable that you are located in Canada.']

['', 'Collaborate with Product Management to ensure that the implementation is in accordance with the requirements and that the features meet expectations.', 'Expeto was founded on a simple, yet compelling principle - enable meaningful IoT outcomes by transforming traditional mobile network complexity into IT simplicity. Expeto integrates mobile networks and IoT applications onto a single platform specifically designed for enterprise use cases and is sold as a service leveraging modern cloud and edge computing resources. Expeto believes that harnessing data from connected devices around the world will unlock insights that shape business strategy, create new revenue opportunities, and help companies make better, more informed decisions to ensure a sustainable future.', 'Sustainability and efficiency are a way of life for Expeto, and we believe our platform will continue to unlock new opportunities to reduce energy usage and the net carbon footprint of our customer’s operations. Join us - #Nextworking.', 'Collaborate with the development team to ensure development guidelines and methodologies are followed and continuously improved.', 'Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.', 'Architect, design, and implement key technologies into the product offering.Collaborate with the development team to ensure development guidelines and methodologies are followed and continuously improved.Collaborate with Product Management to ensure that the implementation is in accordance with the requirements and that the features meet expectations.Work with prospects and customers to deploy and support installations around the world.', 'Expeto is an equal opportunity employer. Should you require accommodation in any aspect of our selection process, please contact our recruitment team at careers (at) expeto (dot) io.', 'Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.', 'At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).', 'Work with prospects and customers to deploy and support installations around the world.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.', 'In order to be considered you must have:', 'Architect, design, and implement key technologies into the product offering.', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to perform a wide variety of diversified software development tasks ranging from architecture, design, and implementation; to helping customers troubleshoot systems. This requires an in-depth understanding of the technology stack, application of agile methodologies, and attention to detail.', 'remote', 'Key responsibilities include:', 'Why Expeto?', 'This will be a\xa0remote\xa0position, however, it is preferable that you are located in the MST or PST.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.', 'Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'Our people come first because it is their commitment and passion that makes the difference in everything we do. We are a growing distributed team with a culture of collaboration, and a focus on creating the best end-to-end customer experience possible. We trust each other and rely on a leader rich organization in which people are expected to wear many hats and step up when they see a problem that needs to be solved. We are great communicators and appreciate perfect candor and the frank dialog necessary to keep us true to our vision and delivering on our mission.']

['', "You have a passion for high-quality, reliable and maintainable code. You’re comfortable working side by side with product managers, designers, and clients, making decisions together in order to quickly deliver valuable working software to clients and their users. You’re agile and retrospective, and not afraid to identify what we’re doing wrong so we can fix it, and what we're doing right so we can improve on it. Above all, you judge your success by the success of your team and the happiness of our customers.", 'You Will Be Responsible For', 'Experience building and deploying in a continuous delivery environmentExperience working directly with clientsExperience adapting or contributing to open-source frameworksExperience in release managementExperience supporting production systems using Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) practicesExperience with Kubernetes, Chef, Ansible, BOSH, or related automation / orchestration toolsSome experience working with NTP, SAML, OAuth 2, Active DirectoryExperience using VMware vSphere / ESXi / NSX-TExperience with networking and related technologies (e.g. loadbalancing / DNS / SSL / firewalls / NAT / SDN)Strong experience with full-stack development', 'Experience supporting production systems using Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) practices', 'Experience with Continuous Integration (CI) tools', 'Required Skills and Experience', 'Experience in training, mentoring and/or up-skilling others', 'As a software engineer, you will pair daily with government software engineers, coaching them in Extreme Programming (XP) methodologies and approaches while helping them to define, validate, communicate, and execute product vision and strategy. You will work with a team of product managers, designers, and engineers to enable your client team to go fast forever.\xa0', 'Enabling client leadership to grow their own engineering practice', 'Some experience working with NTP, SAML, OAuth 2, Active Directory', 'Teaching your client pairs how to do the above for themselves', 'In order for you to support these agencies, U.S. citizenship is a requirement. During the COVID-19 crisis, this collaboration is all managed remotely. This role comes with the expectation once the crisis is resolved, you'll be traveling up to 30% of the time.", 'This position will support client work across a variety of Department of Defense (DoD), Intelligence Community (IC), and Civilian agency programs and customers.\xa0', 'Working with your client engineers to enable them in XP software development practices and/or application modernization practices', 'Experience leading a product or development team', 'Experience working directly with clients', "Working with your client engineers to enable them in XP software development practices and/or application modernization practicesPair programming with clients and other VMware Pivotal Labs engineers to build/modernize software based on the team’s backlogWorking with your team to provide technical input on product, design, and architectural decisions (such as technical complexity and feasibility)Help the team manage risk and uncertainty while moving the team forwardTeaching your client pairs how to do the above for themselvesEnabling client leadership to grow their own engineering practiceContributing back to VMware Pivotal Lab's engineering practice through mentorship, giving talks, and experience reports", '5+ years of Software Development experience in a variety of programming languages', "Contributing back to VMware Pivotal Lab's engineering practice through mentorship, giving talks, and experience reports", 'Experience building and deploying in a continuous delivery environment', 'Pair programming with clients and other VMware Pivotal Labs engineers to build/modernize software based on the team’s backlog', 'Help the team manage risk and uncertainty while moving the team forward', 'Ready to build? So are we. Come join VMware’s new exciting Modern Applications Business Unit (MAPBU) team, made up of products and services under the Tanzu portfolio to help customers build, run and manage their most important applications. ', 'All work within the VMWare Pivotal Labs Services team is with the Federal Government,\xa0 in support of multiple Department of Defense (DoD), Intelligence Community (IC), and Civilian agency programs/customers.', 'Experience adapting or contributing to open-source frameworks', 'About Us', 'This position will perform work that the U.S. government has specified can only be performed by a U.S. citizen on U.S. soil, and therefore any offer will be contingent upon verification of both of these requirements.', 'Experience developing cloud-based enterprise software', 'Experience with networking and related technologies (e.g. loadbalancing / DNS / SSL / firewalls / NAT / SDN)', 'Experience in release management', 'BA/BS in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experience', 'Strong experience with full-stack development', 'Experience in training, mentoring and/or up-skilling othersStrong communication skills and interest in a pair-programming environmentExperience in Test Driven Development (TDD) and agile methodologies, including refactoring5+ years of Software Development experience in a variety of programming languagesPassion for growing your skills, tackling interesting work and challenging problemsBA/BS in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experienceExperience developing cloud-based enterprise softwareExperience leading a product or development teamAbility to incrementally define and improve system architecture as a product evolvesExperience modernizing legacy applications/systems in languages such as Java or C#/.NETExperience with Continuous Integration (CI) toolsExperience working directly with clients', 'Experience in Test Driven Development (TDD) and agile methodologies, including refactoring', 'Education']

['About ThousandEyes ', 'About ThousandEyes', 'Experience with network protocols (7 layer OSI model from physical layer to Application layer) is a plus ', 'Excellent object-oriented design skills ', 'Strong Computer Science fundamentals ', 'Learn more about engineering at ThousandEyes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9a_c8yJyzc', 'As a Lead Software Engineer on the BGP Platform team, you will be responsible for leading and designing and implementing solutions that provide visibility into core Internet Infrastructure including ISPs, DNS providers, IaaS, CDNs , SaaS providers and trace the impact of macro scale Internet events to individual users and enterprise networks connecting at the edge. These events include outages, routing hijacks and leaks, DDoS attacks, political interference, among others. ', 'Familiar with Grafana and Prometheus ', '5+ years of software development experience A fast learner and being comfortable working with newer technologies Expert level understanding of C++ Excellent object-oriented design skills Experience with NoSQL Lucene based datastore like ElasticSearch Experience with database technologies like MySQL and document store like MongoDb Experience with container services like docker and kubernetes Experience with streaming architectures, in particular, Kafka Familiar with Grafana and Prometheus Experience in open-source development is a plus Experience with network protocols (7 layer OSI model from physical layer to Application layer) is a plus Strong Computer Science fundamentals Bachelors degree in Computer Science or similar', 'At ThousandEyes, we use cutting-edge technologies and innovative techniques to study and visualize networks on a global scale.ThousandEyes engineers are focused on continuous improvement -- of our product, our codebase, our knowledge, and our skills. We believe in innovation, simplicity, and elegance. We work in small, cross-functional teams where everyone has a voice. ', "ThousandEyes empowers enterprises to see, understand and improve digital experiences for their customers and employees. The ThousandEyes cloud platform offers unmatched vantage points throughout the global Internet and cloud providers, delivering immediate visibility into the digital experience for every user, application, website or service, over any network. ThousandEyes is central to the global operations of the world's largest and fastest growing brands, including Comcast, eBay, HP,120+ of the Global 2000, 75+ of the F500, 20 of the top 25 SaaS providers, 6 of the top 7 US banks, 4 of the top 5 UK banks, and 5 of the top 10 companies on the 2018 Forbes Cloud 100 list. ", 'Experience with NoSQL Lucene based datastore like ElasticSearch ', 'Engineering at ThousandEyes', 'Experience in open-source development is a plus ', 'Engineering at ThousandEyes ', "What we're looking for: ", ' ', 'Experience with container services like docker and kubernetes ', 'About the Role', 'A fast learner and being comfortable working with newer technologies ', "What we're looking for:", 'Expert level understanding of C++ ', 'Bachelors degree in Computer Science or similar', 'About the Role ', 'Experience with streaming architectures, in particular, Kafka ', 'Learn more about engineering at ThousandEyes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9a_c8yJyzc ', 'Experience with database technologies like MySQL and document store like MongoDb ', '5+ years of software development experience ']

We are committed to creating an environment that supports and celebrates the full range of our individual and collective differences, so that everyone can do their best and most innovative work, on the job and in our communities.', 'WorkForce Software Team Members enjoy benefits such as:', '• 401K Match', '• Competitive Salary and Bonuses', '• Fitness Club Reimbursement', 'At WorkForce Software our Development Team is a highly collaborative group of talented individuals who use the latest technologies, tools, and software development processes to make a positive impact on our enterprise and mid-size organizations across the world. job_title: Senior Software Engineer in Artificial Intelligence
job_text: ['\xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems ', '\xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ', "\xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field ", '\xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java ', "You'll need to have:", '\xa05+ years of software development experience ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) \xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills \xa0Experience designing and using relational databases \xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems \xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code \xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients \xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'Help us improve our low-latency, high-volume pipeline, which carries two million news stories and half a billion tweets daily. You will integrate new functionality, such as supporting more document formats and publishing the output of our AI systems to more downstream listeners. You will improve the speed and reliability of the existing pipeline. ', '\xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills ', "We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join our rapidly growing Artificial Intelligence team.\xa0News and social media move financial markets.\xa0 We are one of the largest producers of news in the world and ingests over 70,000 external news feeds and social media like Twitter each day. This data keeps our clients informed, and our team's insights help make sense of it for our customers. ", 'New York, NY - USA', "We'd love to see:", '\xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) ', 'Who are we?', 'Our Artificial Intelligence (AI) group: researchers and engineers who have a passion for solving complex problems. Our charter: to extract relevant, meaningful, tradable, and actionable information (pricings, earnings, recommendations and major events) from data (news, web, social media, and structured data) in real-time. Since our customers rely on this information to make swift financial decisions, we guarantee precision, accuracy and latency beyond most academic and industry standards. ', '\xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing ', "We'll trust you to:", "\xa05+ years of software development experience \xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field \xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them \xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing \xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java \xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN \xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ", ' ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code ', 'Who are you?', '\xa0Experience designing and using relational databases ', '\xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence ', '\xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'New York, NY - USA ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence', 'A strong software engineer who enjoys building and improving complex, large-scale systems. You like writing testable and maintainable code. You are autonomous: you know whether your time is best spent thinking about the architecture or writing a tool that helps you get the job done. You want to join a close-knit group and make a big impact. ']

['', '‘Small company culture’: very little red tape to get in the way of great ideas', 'We take COVID-19 seriously!', 'Sr. Software Engineer', 'We are a fast-growing company with several market-leading products with optics at its core. Key product areas from Wasatch Photonics include Raman Spectroscopy, Optical Coherence Tomography, Hyperspectral Imaging, Volume Phase Holographic Gratings, and Diffractive Optics. The Company is an ideal place for energetic and innovative individuals looking to grow a developing company with exceptional products in a fast-paced startup driven environment. Wasatch Photonics provides a collaborative and cordial environment, and sees the growth and development of its team members as integral for its success.', 'Natural curiosity and a strong desire to pursue a career that effects positive change in the world.', 'Location:', 'rendered documentation systems (Doxygen, Javadoc etc)', 'R (R Studio)', 'Strong communication skills and positive attitude to work with engineering, manufacturing, and business teams towards success of products.', 'Specify and use the tools and products you require to get the job done', 'We take COVID-19 seriously!\xa0The safety of our employees and customers is paramount, particularly during these times. We practice social distancing, mask-wearing, use of hand sanitizer, and perform enhanced cleaning of common areas to facilitate a safe & healthy environment for our on-site staff. Employees with duties at our plants are on a rotating schedule to keep building occupancy low and undergo temperature screening daily, while many others are working remotely.', 'We are looking to expand our teams to support our continuing market expansion. If you enjoy working in a dynamic, growth driven environment with the latest technology – then we look forward to hearing from you and discussing what we might achieve together!', 'Share in the profits of the business', 'Document the journey effectively, and preferably with flair.', 'Demonstrable knowledge in either Python or C# required', 'Primary Job Responsibilities', 'Maintain and extend\xa0ENLIGHTEN™, our cross-platform realtime desktop spectroscopy GUI.', 'Location:\xa0The position is located in Orlando, Florida (Central Florida Research Park). Occasional domestic and international travel may be required.', 'BS in CompSci, Computer Engineering or other scientific discipline.Natural curiosity and a strong desire to pursue a career that effects positive change in the world.Strong communication skills and positive attitude to work with engineering, manufacturing, and business teams towards success of products.Strong organizational skills and capability of performing necessary written documentation.Self-motivated to work on multiple development projects simultaneously.', 'C# (WinForms, async, multithreading, Xamarin)Python (Numpy, PySide2, pip, pyinstaller)C/C++ (Visual Studio, GCC, gmake)Qt4/5 (Designer, signal/slots, UI thread)Linux / bash userland proficiencyrendered documentation systems (Doxygen, Javadoc etc)publishing to Apple and/or Google Play app storesBluetooth Low-Energy (GATT profiles, characteristics)R (R Studio)LabVIEWfirmware, bare-metal or RTOS C (Keil, ARM)XCode / Swiftsignal processing (peakfinding, wavelets, regressions)', 'Wasatch Photonics has long been known for its superior optical designs for spectroscopy and OCT, drawing upon our own high efficiency holographic gratings. And we want our software to be just as good — efficiently and robustly exchanging data and commands over protocols like USB and Bluetooth, then processing and graphing spectral data using custom algorithms and widget frameworks. You will have the opportunity to lead full-stack development from application-level device driver to desktop GUI to mobile app, supporting a range of platforms, operating systems and language bindings.', 'Qt4/5 (Designer, signal/slots, UI thread)', 'Strong organizational skills and capability of performing necessary written documentation.', 'Be the assigned lead engineer on development and sustainment projects, responsible for bringing customer inspired technical solutions to fruition.', '3+ years professional experience in object-oriented development and designDemonstrable knowledge in either Python or C# requiredDemonstrated proficiency at bitwise operations (bitmasks, endian flipping, de/serialization etc)Experience in formal software configuration management and revision control (Git preferred)', 'Lead development on new cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android phone and tablet platforms.', 'BS in CompSci, Computer Engineering or other scientific discipline.', 'We offer a fast-paced development environment, a variety of interesting & overlapping projects, and a positive collaborative atmosphere where you will learn about the physics, optics and chemistry underlying our spectroscopy and optical coherence tomography technology. We are here to build upon one another’s talents and succeed as a team.', 'Required Experience', 'We are seeking a talented Software Engineer to be part of an innovative, close-knit product development group creating our next-generation Raman, spectroscopy and optical coherence tomography (OCT) applications. As a company, we work with leading researchers developing new scientific techniques to revolutionize healthcare, security, food security, materials development & processing, and environmental monitoring. As a senior developer with us, the performance of the apps and drivers you create will be a key factor in their success, and will accelerate the path to market for revolutionary technologies by our many OEM customers.', 'C# (WinForms, async, multithreading, Xamarin)', 'Contribute to our internal manufacturing, test automation and quality control software.', 'C/C++ (Visual Studio, GCC, gmake)', 'Support and expand our collection of\xa0application-level USB wrappers and sample code\xa0allowing easy control of spectrometers from a variety of languages including C/C++, C#, Python, LabVIEW, MATLAB, Delphi and others.', '3+ years professional experience in object-oriented development and design', 'Demonstrated proficiency at bitwise operations (bitmasks, endian flipping, de/serialization etc)', 'Education / Skills', 'Interface with multi-disciplinary teams and communicate well with technical experts in optics, electronics, mechanical design and volume manufacturing.', 'Flexibility and compassion in your schedule when you need it', 'Work with and learn from celebrated scientists in the field of Raman, spectroscopy, and OCT', 'Maintain and extend\xa0ENLIGHTEN™, our cross-platform it.', 'Linux / bash userland proficiency', 'firmware, bare-metal or RTOS C (Keil, ARM)', 'If this sounds like the kind of challenge and environment that brings out the best in you, then the best of us Here’s a few of the benefits that make us different:', 'publishing to Apple and/or Google Play app stores', 'What We Offer', 'LabVIEW', 'About Wasatch Photonics', 'Optional / Preferred Experience', 'Planned career development opportunities', 'signal processing (peakfinding, wavelets, regressions)', 'Self-motivated to work on multiple development projects simultaneously.', 'Python (Numpy, PySide2, pip, pyinstaller)', 'Experience in formal software configuration management and revision control (Git preferred)', 'Work with and learn from celebrated scientists in the field of Raman, spectroscopy, and OCTSpecify and use the tools and products you require to get the job doneFlexibility and compassion in your schedule when you need itShare in the profits of the business‘Small company culture’: very little red tape to get in the way of great ideasPlanned career development opportunities', 'XCode / Swift']

['', 'Implement automated tests', 'Companies need a better, faster way to share personal data so they can demonstrate regulatory compliance\xa0and\xa0achieve their business goals. Evident solves all of these challenges by supporting businesses’ compliance with ever-changing regulatory requirements while enabling them to thoroughly verify their users’ identities and credentials.', 'Why Evident?', 'Responsibilities', "Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field5+ years of experience in one or more of the following languages: Scala, Python and/or Java. Having professional dev project experience in Scala is required.Deep understanding of object oriented and functional paradigmsWillingness to learn and work with technology stacks different from the ones used in the pastSolid background in RESTful Web Services\xadStrong grasp of relational and non-relational (NoSQL) databasesBackground in Networks and Security (Public Key Infrastructure, SSL, Crypto)Proficiency in Linux and Shell scriptingProficient in gitKnowledge of ansible or similar provisioning tool is a plusFull-stack experience is a plus\xadWorking knowledge of Single-Sign-On, OAuth and JavaScript is a plus", '• Weekly stipend for home lunch delivery, home internet stipend, virtual events, & more!', 'Deep understanding of object oriented and functional paradigms', '• Full medical, dental, vision benefits and 401K', 'Solve issues and implement solutions along with test cases', 'Job Description', 'Strong grasp of relational and non-relational (NoSQL) databases', '• Our team solves a crucial problem with huge business potential together, and we are able to see exactly how our contribution affects customers!', '• Unlimited vacation', 'Proficiency in Linux and Shell scriptingProficient in git', 'Working knowledge of Single-Sign-On, OAuth and JavaScript is a plus', 'Full-stack experience is a plus\xad', 'and', 'Evident is seeking a highly motivated and talented Backend Software Engineer to join our team and help build the components that make our unique solutions. The ideal candidate is a versatile self starter with a Computer Science degree. The Software Engineer’s responsibilities include crafting and developing software for Evident’s cloud platform, web interface, and/or mobile apps.\xa0', "• Recently named one of Atlanta's Coolest Companies & 50 on Fire by Atlanta Inno", 'Knowledge of ansible or similar provisioning tool is a plus', 'Willingness to learn and work with technology stacks different from the ones used in the past', 'Requirements', '• Competitive pay package, including base pay and stock options', 'Make improvements to our cloud APIs and work on new features in existing code base', 'Work with other team members defining new features and extending existing ones', 'Make improvements to our cloud APIs and work on new features in existing code baseSolve issues and implement solutions along with test casesWork with other team members defining new features and extending existing onesImplement automated tests', 'The position can be based in Atlanta or remote anywhere in the US. The company is 100% remote for the foreseeable future.', '5+ years of experience in one or more of the following languages: Scala, Python and/or Java. Having professional dev project experience in Scala is required.', 'Background in Networks and Security (Public Key Infrastructure, SSL, Crypto)', "Evident is the only identity and credential verification platform that prioritizes privacy by reducing risk and liability for holding personal data, and is the only verification solution that provides safe and secure access to verified personal data pulled from 6,500+ authoritative data sources through a single API. Evident's game-changing verification technology streamlines user approval process, minimizes attrition, and is built to scale as our customers’ needs change, proving that personal data exchange doesn’t have to come with high risk or unnecessary friction. The need to more confidently and comprehensively verify users is rapidly increasing, but so is the risk of interacting with and storing the sensitive personal data required to conduct elevated verification methods. This environment is compounded by new global data protection regulations like GDPR and CCPA that put parameters in place to safeguard data transmission, and put the onus on companies to adhere to new obligations that respect users’ privacy rights.", '• Recently named one of the Top 10 Fastest Growing Companies in Atlanta & one of the Best Places to Work in Atlanta by Atlanta Business Chronicle', "Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field", '• Annual personal development and technology budget to advance your skills and career', 'Solid background in RESTful Web Services\xad']

['', 'Experience writing/consuming APIs', 'Experience shipping commercial software, building scalable solutions', 'Your background:', 'Thrives in high impact roles where you get to consistently build new software', 'Bonus:', 'You have experience building blockchain applications, especially in Ethereum', 'Current tech stack: ', '\xa0', 'Clear, effective, positive communication', 'React, GraphQL, TypeScript, Node.Js, Kubernetes, NoSQL; Agile frameworks', "Our client is tackling the Climate crisis by creating\xa0a marketplace where anyone in the world can pay for and get paid for removing and storing atmospheric carbon dioxide.\xa0They're searching for a dynamic engineer with a focus on delivering an elegant experience to customers using TypeScript/React and architecting services using GraphQL (among many other technologies) to support it. In this position, you’ll play a major role in building technology that allows enterprises of all sizes easily and verifiably buy and sell digital certificates of carbon removal for reversing climate change.", 'Startup Experience', 'DevOps and GIS experience', 'Proficiency in Full Stack Development using a combination of React and the other technologies listed above', 'By working directly with farmers and creating a secure marketplace using cryptocurrency, they’re gaining National recognition in the ever-growing climate technology industry. If you are passionate about using technology to solve challenging/interesting problems and care about the environment, this is a tremendous opportunity to get involved with a company that has great values and impressive benefits/compensation.', 'Customer-centric', 'If you don’t currently live in Seattle, you must be willing to relocate. This role will be remote to start, but will transition to office with some remote post pandemic.']

All employment decisions at Better are based on a person’s merit, business needs, and role requirements.', 'Deep experience in automation that makes the engineering experience better. This could include scripting, command line tools, or libraries among other things.', 'A Better opportunity', " Right now we’re funding over $3 billion in home loans per month We’ve funded over $14 billion in loans and $3.5 billion in insurance  We ranked #1 in the U.S. on LinkedIn's Top Startups 2020 We ranked #11 on Fortune’s Best Places to Work in Financial Services 2020 Our Founder and CEO was named in Comparably's Top 25 CEOs for Diversity We were listed to Forbes’ FinTech 50 2020 And #15 on the 2020 CNBC Disruptor 50  We’ve secured over $254 million from our investors to date  ", 'Experience with documenting and doing demos to help with adoption of tools.', 'Build a system to fast forward a loan file to any point in the loan process which will help the operations and test teams do more effective training and testing', ' Ability to tackle complex technical problems to increase engineer efficiency. Deep experience in automation that makes the engineering experience better. This could include scripting, command line tools, or libraries among other things. Passionate about delivering robust working software to internal engineering teams. We are scaling rapidly and anticipate many challenges and opportunities due to that. Advocate and guide others about high quality software and the practices needed to achieve that. Experience with documenting and doing demos to help with adoption of tools. ', ' Build a system to fast forward a loan file to any point in the loan process which will help the operations and test teams do more effective training and testing Build more effective micro service testing using contracts or api tooling which can be shared across multiple engineering teams Improve our CI pipelines that run thousands of tests across hundreds of thousands of lines of code in a few minutes (with about 85% coverage) Determine a way to triage potentially flaky tests, such as, creating build monitors, failing test notifications, automatic detection of the change that could cause the test to become flaky, and automatic quarantine of tests Partner with the SRE team on monitoring, observability and alerting to improve Mean Time to Detect, Mean Time To Repair, and Uptime. ', 'Terraform for infrastructure as code', "Our Founder and CEO was named in Comparably's Top 25 CEOs for Diversity", 'Advocate and guide others about high quality software and the practices needed to achieve that.', 'Build more effective micro service testing using contracts or api tooling which can be shared across multiple engineering teams', 'We ranked #11 on Fortune’s Best Places to Work in Financial Services 2020', 'We optimize for mission, not ego', 'Kubernetes, for deployment and devops', 'Depending on your location, the California Consumer Privacy Act or other laws may regulate the way we manage the data of job applicants. For further information on how we collect data of job applicants, please click here. By submitting your application, you are agreeing to our use and processing of your data as required.', 'We act like owners, not just employees', ' We ship code 50-100 times every day Node.js, Python (3.6), and GoLang for services Ember.js, React, Typescript on the frontend ES6 across the stack Postgres for the database, Redshift for our Data warehouse Kubernetes, for deployment and devops Terraform for infrastructure as code AWS for infrastructure, maximising EC2, S3, CloudFront, Route53, and much more ', 'Better technology']

['', 'Collaborate with Product Management to ensure that the implementation is in accordance with the requirements and that the features meet expectations.', 'Expeto was founded on a simple, yet compelling principle - enable meaningful IoT outcomes by transforming traditional mobile network complexity into IT simplicity. Expeto integrates mobile networks and IoT applications onto a single platform specifically designed for enterprise use cases and is sold as a service leveraging modern cloud and edge computing resources. Expeto believes that harnessing data from connected devices around the world will unlock insights that shape business strategy, create new revenue opportunities, and help companies make better, more informed decisions to ensure a sustainable future.', 'Sustainability and efficiency are a way of life for Expeto, and we believe our platform will continue to unlock new opportunities to reduce energy usage and the net carbon footprint of our customer’s operations. Join us - #Nextworking.', 'Collaborate with the development team to ensure development guidelines and methodologies are followed and continuously improved.', 'Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.', 'Architect, design, and implement key technologies into the product offering.Collaborate with the development team to ensure development guidelines and methodologies are followed and continuously improved.Collaborate with Product Management to ensure that the implementation is in accordance with the requirements and that the features meet expectations.Work with prospects and customers to deploy and support installations around the world.', 'Expeto is an equal opportunity employer. Should you require accommodation in any aspect of our selection process, please contact our recruitment team at careers (at) expeto (dot) io.', 'Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.', 'At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).', 'Work with prospects and customers to deploy and support installations around the world.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.', 'In order to be considered you must have:', 'Architect, design, and implement key technologies into the product offering.', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to perform a wide variety of diversified software development tasks ranging from architecture, design, and implementation; to helping customers troubleshoot systems. This requires an in-depth understanding of the technology stack, application of agile methodologies, and attention to detail.', 'remote', 'Key responsibilities include:', 'Why Expeto?', 'Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.', 'Our people come first because it is their commitment and passion that makes the difference in everything we do. We are a growing distributed team with a culture of collaboration, and a focus on creating the best end-to-end customer experience possible. We trust each other and rely on a leader rich organization in which people are expected to wear many hats and step up when they see a problem that needs to be solved. We are great communicators and appreciate perfect candor and the frank dialog necessary to keep us true to our vision and delivering on our mission.', 'This will be a\xa0remote\xa0position, however, it is preferable that you are located in Canada.']

['', 'Collaborate with Product Management to ensure that the implementation is in accordance with the requirements and that the features meet expectations.', 'Expeto was founded on a simple, yet compelling principle - enable meaningful IoT outcomes by transforming traditional mobile network complexity into IT simplicity. Expeto integrates mobile networks and IoT applications onto a single platform specifically designed for enterprise use cases and is sold as a service leveraging modern cloud and edge computing resources. Expeto believes that harnessing data from connected devices around the world will unlock insights that shape business strategy, create new revenue opportunities, and help companies make better, more informed decisions to ensure a sustainable future.', 'Sustainability and efficiency are a way of life for Expeto, and we believe our platform will continue to unlock new opportunities to reduce energy usage and the net carbon footprint of our customer’s operations. Join us - #Nextworking.', 'Collaborate with the development team to ensure development guidelines and methodologies are followed and continuously improved.', 'Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.', 'Architect, design, and implement key technologies into the product offering.Collaborate with the development team to ensure development guidelines and methodologies are followed and continuously improved.Collaborate with Product Management to ensure that the implementation is in accordance with the requirements and that the features meet expectations.Work with prospects and customers to deploy and support installations around the world.', 'Expeto is an equal opportunity employer. Should you require accommodation in any aspect of our selection process, please contact our recruitment team at careers (at) expeto (dot) io.', 'Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.', 'At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).', 'Work with prospects and customers to deploy and support installations around the world.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.', 'In order to be considered you must have:', 'Architect, design, and implement key technologies into the product offering.', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to perform a wide variety of diversified software development tasks ranging from architecture, design, and implementation; to helping customers troubleshoot systems. This requires an in-depth understanding of the technology stack, application of agile methodologies, and attention to detail.', 'remote', 'Key responsibilities include:', 'Why Expeto?', 'Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.', 'Our people come first because it is their commitment and passion that makes the difference in everything we do. We are a growing distributed team with a culture of collaboration, and a focus on creating the best end-to-end customer experience possible. We trust each other and rely on a leader rich organization in which people are expected to wear many hats and step up when they see a problem that needs to be solved. We are great communicators and appreciate perfect candor and the frank dialog necessary to keep us true to our vision and delivering on our mission.', 'This will be a\xa0remote\xa0position, however, it is preferable that you are located in Canada.']

['', 'You will be part of a small, close-knit, cross-functional team consisting of data engineers, data scientists, and product managers to solve customer data problems with elegant, well thought out solutions.\xa0', 'Nice to Have', 'This is also a product engineering role. ', 'Perform design and code reviews and resolve production issues and ensure that the service is running smoothly at all times.\xa0', 'Produce thoughtful design docs and readable, performant, automation testing friendly code.\xa0', '3+ years of professional experience working on production RESTful web services in cloud environments (AWS or GCP)Have a strong command in PythonHave a strong command on SQL and database performanceEnjoy taking ownership and getting things done - we value curiosity (willingness to figure things out and understand how systems work), passion (strong desire to build the right things and build things right), and entrepreneurial spirit (a bias for action and getting things done).\xa0Are comfortable with ambiguity - healthcare data can be messy and challenging and requires patience, tenacity, and reverse engineering skill. But the satisfaction when customers love our features is priceless.\xa0', 'They are an equal opportunity employer and are committed to providing reasonable accommodations and will work with you to meet your needs. If you are a person with a disability and require assistance during the application process, please don’t hesitate to reach out.', 'Senior Software Engineer - Data', 'Take ownership of the code base and proactively leave the code better than it was by continuously improving it.', 'Experience working with serverless technologies like AWS lambdas, API Gateways and SQSExperience in developing GraphQL APIsExperience working on healthcare products', 'They are a fast-growing healthcare tech company that develops software that increases patient access to medical care by optimizing how health systems use expensive, constrained resources. More than 300 hospitals, health systems, and cancer centers – including Stanford Health, Duke University Health System, MultiCare Health, UCSF Health, Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, the University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center, UCHealth, OhioHealth, NewYork-Presbyterian, Johns Hopkins Medicine, and others – rely on their products to improve patient access, decrease wait times, and lower the cost of healthcare delivery. ', 'Experience working with serverless technologies like AWS lambdas, API Gateways and SQS', 'They have also raised $110+ million dollars from prominent investors in healthcare, including $40 million from Goldman Sachs. The team includes veteran executives and the brightest minds backed by industry leaders in the healthcare space. CBInsights recently named them among the top 100 AI companies in the world. Healthcare Innovation selected them as the 2019 winner in the Data Analytics category.', 'Have a strong command on SQL and database performance', 'Experience working on healthcare products', '3+ years of professional experience working on production RESTful web services in cloud environments (AWS or GCP)', 'Experience in developing GraphQL APIs', 'Are comfortable with ambiguity - healthcare data can be messy and challenging and requires patience, tenacity, and reverse engineering skill. But the satisfaction when customers love our features is priceless.\xa0']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer in Artificial Intelligence
job_text: ['\xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems ', '\xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ', "\xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field ", '\xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java ', "You'll need to have:", '\xa05+ years of software development experience ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) \xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills \xa0Experience designing and using relational databases \xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems \xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code \xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients \xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'Help us improve our low-latency, high-volume pipeline, which carries two million news stories and half a billion tweets daily. You will integrate new functionality, such as supporting more document formats and publishing the output of our AI systems to more downstream listeners. You will improve the speed and reliability of the existing pipeline. ', '\xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills ', "We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join our rapidly growing Artificial Intelligence team.\xa0News and social media move financial markets.\xa0 We are one of the largest producers of news in the world and ingests over 70,000 external news feeds and social media like Twitter each day. This data keeps our clients informed, and our team's insights help make sense of it for our customers. ", 'New York, NY - USA', "We'd love to see:", '\xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) ', 'Who are we?', 'Our Artificial Intelligence (AI) group: researchers and engineers who have a passion for solving complex problems. Our charter: to extract relevant, meaningful, tradable, and actionable information (pricings, earnings, recommendations and major events) from data (news, web, social media, and structured data) in real-time. Since our customers rely on this information to make swift financial decisions, we guarantee precision, accuracy and latency beyond most academic and industry standards. ', '\xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing ', "We'll trust you to:", "\xa05+ years of software development experience \xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field \xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them \xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing \xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java \xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN \xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ", ' ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code ', 'Who are you?', '\xa0Experience designing and using relational databases ', '\xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence ', '\xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'New York, NY - USA ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence', 'A strong software engineer who enjoys building and improving complex, large-scale systems. You like writing testable and maintainable code. You are autonomous: you know whether your time is best spent thinking about the architecture or writing a tool that helps you get the job done. You want to join a close-knit group and make a big impact. ']

['', 'Qualifications', 'Responsibilities', 'These Requirements Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following Specialized Security Screenings', 'Microsoft Cloud Background Check', "We'd Love To Talk To You, If You", 'Required Qualifications', "A bac <![CDATA[ PRINCIPAL PROGRAM MANAGER LEADDo you have a passion for making developers across Microsoft more productive? Do you love the gratification of helping someone in Microsoft deliver great products? Do you love learning how the leading tech companies make their developers more productive? Want to build and evolve the tools and tech that enable developers to build, test, and deploy in minutes? If so, and you’d like to do this across 6,000+ engineers, come join the Cosine Developer Productivity team!As a part of the Microsoft Cloud + AI division, the COSINE (Core Operating System & Intelligent Edge) organization delivers technologies and solutions for the Operating System platform foundation across Microsoft’s product lines. Whether it’s to power the 1+ Billion Windows 10 devices running in homes and businesses worldwide or to fueling the growth of highly scalable Azure Cloud and Windows Servers - we are the platform engine, critical in accomplishing the mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more!ResponsibilitiesOur team helps Developers creating Windows to be more productive by providing them services, tools and guidance. We are a fun tightly nit team who are super passionate about what we do and how we come together as team to do it. We deeply recognize that our team has one of the most leveraged Jobs at Microsoft. Small improvements in productivity of developers enable Microsoft in deliver far more valuable products to the Billion+ customers of ours, and we build on each others’ ideas to generate creative and novel ways to achieve our goals.We’re looking for a strong Principal PM Lead who cares deeply about the culture of the feature team to create the best ideas together… someone who is passionate about engaging with customers to know their needs well and comfortable in the use of data to make decisions.We'd Love To Talk To You, If YouAre a passionate problem solver, who continuously strives to make things betterEnjoy wearing multiple hats and digging in to make things happenAre equally comfortable articulating the big picture and refining the small details of a designAre customer and data obsessed, always learning, and refining your features to deliver maximum business impactLove pushing for clarity in communication and can explain large, complex systems, in simple-straightforward languageHave a strong drive to take a broad view on platform, thinking not only about the traditional topics of code and tools, but also in culture and needs of Developers.Know how to balance passion and opinion with being a great team playerRequired QualificationsYou have 3+ years of people management experienceYou are a genuine self-starter, who proactively identifies problems, proposes solutions and drives a team to address themYou are open-minded and continuously searching for “Why” behind the data being reported/observedYou are a change agent driving cultural change of your teamYou are strong technically, with a track record of successfully designing and delivering solutions for complex technical problemsA bachelor’s degree in Engineering or equivalent discipline required10+ years of experience designing and shipping high-quality software productsStrong written/verbal communication skillsThese Requirements Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following Specialized Security ScreeningsAbility to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role.Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.#ES3Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work."]

job_title: Senior Software Engineer in Artificial Intelligence
job_text: ['\xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems ', '\xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ', "\xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field ", '\xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java ', "You'll need to have:", '\xa05+ years of software development experience ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) \xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills \xa0Experience designing and using relational databases \xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems \xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code \xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients \xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'Help us improve our low-latency, high-volume pipeline, which carries two million news stories and half a billion tweets daily. You will integrate new functionality, such as supporting more document formats and publishing the output of our AI systems to more downstream listeners. You will improve the speed and reliability of the existing pipeline. ', '\xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills ', "We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join our rapidly growing Artificial Intelligence team.\xa0News and social media move financial markets.\xa0 We are one of the largest producers of news in the world and ingests over 70,000 external news feeds and social media like Twitter each day. This data keeps our clients informed, and our team's insights help make sense of it for our customers. ", 'New York, NY - USA', "We'd love to see:", '\xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) ', 'Who are we?', 'Our Artificial Intelligence (AI) group: researchers and engineers who have a passion for solving complex problems. Our charter: to extract relevant, meaningful, tradable, and actionable information (pricings, earnings, recommendations and major events) from data (news, web, social media, and structured data) in real-time. Since our customers rely on this information to make swift financial decisions, we guarantee precision, accuracy and latency beyond most academic and industry standards. ', '\xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing ', "We'll trust you to:", "\xa05+ years of software development experience \xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field \xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them \xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing \xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java \xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN \xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ", ' ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code ', 'Who are you?', '\xa0Experience designing and using relational databases ', '\xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence ', '\xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'New York, NY - USA ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence', 'A strong software engineer who enjoys building and improving complex, large-scale systems. You like writing testable and maintainable code. You are autonomous: you know whether your time is best spent thinking about the architecture or writing a tool that helps you get the job done. You want to join a close-knit group and make a big impact. ']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer in Artificial Intelligence
job_text: ['\xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems ', '\xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ', "\xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field ", '\xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java ', "You'll need to have:", '\xa05+ years of software development experience ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) \xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills \xa0Experience designing and using relational databases \xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems \xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code \xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients \xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'Help us improve our low-latency, high-volume pipeline, which carries two million news stories and half a billion tweets daily. You will integrate new functionality, such as supporting more document formats and publishing the output of our AI systems to more downstream listeners. You will improve the speed and reliability of the existing pipeline. ', '\xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills ', "We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join our rapidly growing Artificial Intelligence team.\xa0News and social media move financial markets.\xa0 We are one of the largest producers of news in the world and ingests over 70,000 external news feeds and social media like Twitter each day. This data keeps our clients informed, and our team's insights help make sense of it for our customers. ", 'New York, NY - USA', "We'd love to see:", '\xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) ', 'Who are we?', 'Our Artificial Intelligence (AI) group: researchers and engineers who have a passion for solving complex problems. Our charter: to extract relevant, meaningful, tradable, and actionable information (pricings, earnings, recommendations and major events) from data (news, web, social media, and structured data) in real-time. Since our customers rely on this information to make swift financial decisions, we guarantee precision, accuracy and latency beyond most academic and industry standards. ', '\xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing ', "We'll trust you to:", "\xa05+ years of software development experience \xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field \xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them \xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing \xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java \xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN \xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ", ' ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code ', 'Who are you?', '\xa0Experience designing and using relational databases ', '\xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence ', '\xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'New York, NY - USA ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence', 'A strong software engineer who enjoys building and improving complex, large-scale systems. You like writing testable and maintainable code. You are autonomous: you know whether your time is best spent thinking about the architecture or writing a tool that helps you get the job done. You want to join a close-knit group and make a big impact. ']

['', 'Qualifications', 'Responsibilities', 'These Requirements Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following Specialized Security Screenings', 'Microsoft Cloud Background Check', "We'd Love To Talk To You, If You", 'Required Qualifications', "A bac <![CDATA[ PRINCIPAL PROGRAM MANAGER LEADDo you have a passion for making developers across Microsoft more productive? Do you love the gratification of helping someone in Microsoft deliver great products? Do you love learning how the leading tech companies make their developers more productive? Want to build and evolve the tools and tech that enable developers to build, test, and deploy in minutes? If so, and you’d like to do this across 6,000+ engineers, come join the Cosine Developer Productivity team!As a part of the Microsoft Cloud + AI division, the COSINE (Core Operating System & Intelligent Edge) organization delivers technologies and solutions for the Operating System platform foundation across Microsoft’s product lines. Whether it’s to power the 1+ Billion Windows 10 devices running in homes and businesses worldwide or to fueling the growth of highly scalable Azure Cloud and Windows Servers - we are the platform engine, critical in accomplishing the mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more!ResponsibilitiesOur team helps Developers creating Windows to be more productive by providing them services, tools and guidance. We are a fun tightly nit team who are super passionate about what we do and how we come together as team to do it. We deeply recognize that our team has one of the most leveraged Jobs at Microsoft. Small improvements in productivity of developers enable Microsoft in deliver far more valuable products to the Billion+ customers of ours, and we build on each others’ ideas to generate creative and novel ways to achieve our goals.We’re looking for a strong Principal PM Lead who cares deeply about the culture of the feature team to create the best ideas together… someone who is passionate about engaging with customers to know their needs well and comfortable in the use of data to make decisions.We'd Love To Talk To You, If YouAre a passionate problem solver, who continuously strives to make things betterEnjoy wearing multiple hats and digging in to make things happenAre equally comfortable articulating the big picture and refining the small details of a designAre customer and data obsessed, always learning, and refining your features to deliver maximum business impactLove pushing for clarity in communication and can explain large, complex systems, in simple-straightforward languageHave a strong drive to take a broad view on platform, thinking not only about the traditional topics of code and tools, but also in culture and needs of Developers.Know how to balance passion and opinion with being a great team playerRequired QualificationsYou have 3+ years of people management experienceYou are a genuine self-starter, who proactively identifies problems, proposes solutions and drives a team to address themYou are open-minded and continuously searching for “Why” behind the data being reported/observedYou are a change agent driving cultural change of your teamYou are strong technically, with a track record of successfully designing and delivering solutions for complex technical problemsA bachelor’s degree in Engineering or equivalent discipline required10+ years of experience designing and shipping high-quality software productsStrong written/verbal communication skillsThese Requirements Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following Specialized Security ScreeningsAbility to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role.Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.#ES3Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work."]

["Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. ", '\xa0 ', "Desire to Learn and Adapt. We have a lot of projects going on at once, and you'll have to learn to navigate the code and features. You'll constantly be learning new areas and new technologies. Passion. Our customers are passionateand we want the same from our engineers. We want you to actively own your work and be excited about your projects. Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.", "Are you interested in being part of a small team tasked to build the next-generation industry-leading platform for machine data? We are building a new foundation for Cloud offerings. Utilizing some of the most modern tools available, such as Kubernetes and Go, this is an excellent opportunity to impact the effort to define and build the future of our company. You will be joining a team that's developing both the engine that drives our machine-data platform as well as the infrastructure to run and scale it. ", "Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. ", 'What You Provide ', "Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. Breadth and depth. You want to work on an area that spans backend and frontend and SDKs? We have that. You want to go deep into optimizing how we compress data for fast random-access retrieval? We have that too, and more. Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. A stable, collaborative and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen and sit down for a quick sync every morning. Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. ', "We give our engineers an environment in which they can contribute from day one while also providing opportunities for learning and growth. You'll learn how our entire stack works - from data ingestion and storage to searching, reporting and building dashboards – all in distributed environments. The work you’ll do will directly impact the experience of our customers. ", 'Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.', 'We are an engineering- and product-focused company. Our engineers take a leading role in designing, architecting, building and testing our product. Engineers here have a wide impact, from developing new capabilities like metrics ingestion and analysis to working with customers to see their work be used to solve real-world problems. ', 'Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. ', "Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies ', 'What We Provide', 'What We Provide ', 'What You Provide', ' ', 'Breadth and depth. You want to work on an area that spans backend and frontend and SDKs? We have that. You want to go deep into optimizing how we compress data for fast random-access retrieval? We have that too, and more. ', 'A stable, collaborative and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen and sit down for a quick sync every morning. ', 'Passion. Our customers are passionateand we want the same from our engineers. We want you to actively own your work and be excited about your projects. ', "Desire to Learn and Adapt. We have a lot of projects going on at once, and you'll have to learn to navigate the code and features. You'll constantly be learning new areas and new technologies. "]

Good design/architecture skills for large-scale systems; Excellent analytical, problem solving skills; Familiarity with SDLC tools in a CI/CD environment, such as GITHub, Coverity, Jenkins, graphical debuggers, etc. A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering or another Engineering-related technology field;
