', 'A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering or another Engineering-related technology field; ', 'Linux-C++ Senior Software Engineer New York, NY - USA\xa0Our software team implements world-class software solutions for our Financial Information eXchange (FIX) engine. These applications operate in a HA environment, servicing our electronic trading broker-dealers around the globe. The SLAs set by our High-Frequency/algorithmic Trading clients mean that our FIX Engine must exceed high-performance, low-latency benchmarks. To ensure privacy and secure connectivity, we use industry standard encryption protocols, such as AES, for all electronic trading communications.\xa0Join our growing team of developers, innovate our cluster-based software solution, and architect our upcoming cloud-based offering. FIX is the industry standard for electronic trading communications: capitalize on this opportunity, using the skills from this position to propel your software engineering career into the future of the electronic trading.\xa0What’s in it for you: ', 'You’ll need to have:', 'Familiarity with persistent messaging, such as MQ, Kafka; ']

job_text: ['\xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems ', '\xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ', "\xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field ", '\xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java ', "You'll need to have:", '\xa05+ years of software development experience ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) \xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills \xa0Experience designing and using relational databases \xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems \xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code \xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients \xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'Help us improve our low-latency, high-volume pipeline, which carries two million news stories and half a billion tweets daily. You will integrate new functionality, such as supporting more document formats and publishing the output of our AI systems to more downstream listeners. You will improve the speed and reliability of the existing pipeline. ', '\xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills ', "We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join our rapidly growing Artificial Intelligence team.\xa0News and social media move financial markets.\xa0 We are one of the largest producers of news in the world and ingests over 70,000 external news feeds and social media like Twitter each day. This data keeps our clients informed, and our team's insights help make sense of it for our customers. ", 'New York, NY - USA', "We'd love to see:", '\xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) ', 'Who are we?', 'Our Artificial Intelligence (AI) group: researchers and engineers who have a passion for solving complex problems. Our charter: to extract relevant, meaningful, tradable, and actionable information (pricings, earnings, recommendations and major events) from data (news, web, social media, and structured data) in real-time. Since our customers rely on this information to make swift financial decisions, we guarantee precision, accuracy and latency beyond most academic and industry standards. ', '\xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing ', "We'll trust you to:", "\xa05+ years of software development experience \xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field \xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them \xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing \xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java \xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN \xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ", ' ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code ', 'Who are you?', '\xa0Experience designing and using relational databases ', '\xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence ', '\xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'New York, NY - USA ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence', 'A strong software engineer who enjoys building and improving complex, large-scale systems. You like writing testable and maintainable code. You are autonomous: you know whether your time is best spent thinking about the architecture or writing a tool that helps you get the job done. You want to join a close-knit group and make a big impact. ']

['', 'Qualifications', 'Responsibilities', 'These Requirements Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following Specialized Security Screenings', 'Microsoft Cloud Background Check', "We'd Love To Talk To You, If You", 'Required Qualifications', "A bac <![CDATA[ PRINCIPAL PROGRAM MANAGER LEADDo you have a passion for making developers across Microsoft more productive? Do you love the gratification of helping someone in Microsoft deliver great products? Do you love learning how the leading tech companies make their developers more productive? Want to build and evolve the tools and tech that enable developers to build, test, and deploy in minutes? If so, and you’d like to do this across 6,000+ engineers, come join the Cosine Developer Productivity team!As a part of the Microsoft Cloud + AI division, the COSINE (Core Operating System & Intelligent Edge) organization delivers technologies and solutions for the Operating System platform foundation across Microsoft’s product lines. Whether it’s to power the 1+ Billion Windows 10 devices running in homes and businesses worldwide or to fueling the growth of highly scalable Azure Cloud and Windows Servers - we are the platform engine, critical in accomplishing the mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more!ResponsibilitiesOur team helps Developers creating Windows to be more productive by providing them services, tools and guidance. We are a fun tightly nit team who are super passionate about what we do and how we come together as team to do it. We deeply recognize that our team has one of the most leveraged Jobs at Microsoft. Small improvements in productivity of developers enable Microsoft in deliver far more valuable products to the Billion+ customers of ours, and we build on each others’ ideas to generate creative and novel ways to achieve our goals.We’re looking for a strong Principal PM Lead who cares deeply about the culture of the feature team to create the best ideas together… someone who is passionate about ["Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. ", '\xa0 ', "Desire to Learn and Adapt. We have a lot of projects going on at once, and you'll have to learn to navigate the code and features. You'll constantly be learning new areas and new technologies. Passion. Our customers are passionateand we want the same from our engineers. We want you to actively own your work and be excited about your projects. Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.", "Are you interested in being part of a small team tasked to build the next-generation industry-leading platform for machine data? We are building a new foundation for Cloud offerings. Utilizing some of the most modern tools available, such as Kubernetes and Go, this is an excellent opportunity to impact the effort to define and build the future of our company. You will be joining a team that's developing both the engine that drives our machine-data platform as well as the infrastructure to run and scale it. ", "Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. ", 'What You Provide ', "Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. Breadth and depth. You want to work on an area that spans backend and frontend and SDKs? We have that. You want to go deep into optimizing how we compress data for fast random-access retrieval? We have that too, and more. Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. A stable, collaborative and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen and sit down for a quick sync every morning. Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. ', "We give our engineers an environment in which they can contribute from day one while also providing opportunities for learning and growth. You'll learn how our entire stack works - from data ingestion and storage to searching, reporting and building dashboards – all in distributed environments. The work you’ll do will directly impact the experience of our customers. ", 'Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.', 'We are an engineering- and product-focused company. Our engineers take a leading role in designing, architecting, building and testing our product. Engineers here have a wide impact, from developing new capabilities like metrics ingestion and analysis to working with customers to see their work be used to solve real-world problems. Jenkins, Google Test/Mock, Pytest, Splunk, Grafana; Familiarity with persistent messaging, such as MQ, Kafka; Machine learning background; Knowledge of TLS/SSL Encryption, Open SSL; ', 'What’s in it for you:', 'Machine learning background; Management roles exist in the future – if that’s something you’d be interested in; ', '3+ years C++ programming in a Linux or other recent UNIX O/S; Multi-threading, multi-process, distributed/parallel programming, UNIX IPC; Good design/architecture skills for large-scale systems; Excellent analytical, problem solving skills; Familiarity with SDLC tools in a CI/CD environment, such as GITHub, Coverity, Jenkins, graphical debuggers, etc. A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering or another Engineering-related technology field; ', 'We’ll trust you to:', 'Collaborate with other engineers, business managers, sharing your expertise, and leverage from the experience of seasoned peers; ', 'In-depth exposure to developing systems for all the company’s electronic trading clients; ', 'A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering or another Engineering-related technology field; ', 'Linux-C++ Senior Software Engineer New York, NY - USA\xa0Our software team implements world-class software solutions for our Financial Information eXchange (FIX) engine. These applications operate in a HA environment, servicing our electronic trading broker-dealers around the globe. The SLAs set by our High-Frequency/algorithmic Trading clients mean that our FIX Engine must exceed high-performance, low-latency benchmarks. To ensure privacy and secure connectivity, we use industry standard encryption protocols, such as AES, for all electronic trading communications.\xa0Join our growing team of developers, innovate our cluster-based software solution, and architect our upcoming cloud-based offering. FIX is the industry standard for electronic trading communications: capitalize on this opportunity, using the skills from this position to propel your software engineering career into the future of the electronic trading.\xa0What’s in it for you: ', 'You’ll need to have:', 'Familiarity with persistent messaging, such as MQ, Kafka; ']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer in Artificial Intelligence
job_text: ['\xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems ', '\xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ', "\xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field ", '\xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java ', "You'll need to have:", '\xa05+ years of software development experience ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) \xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills \xa0Experience designing and using relational databases \xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems \xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', '\xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code \xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients \xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'Help us improve our low-latency, high-volume pipeline, which carries two million news stories and half a billion tweets daily. You will integrate new functionality, such as supporting more document formats and publishing the output of our AI systems to more downstream listeners. You will improve the speed and reliability of the existing pipeline. ', '\xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills ', "We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join our rapidly growing Artificial Intelligence team.\xa0News and social media move financial markets.\xa0 We are one of the largest producers of news in the world and ingests over 70,000 external news feeds and social media like Twitter each day. This data keeps our clients informed, and our team's insights help make sense of it for our customers. ", 'New York, NY - USA', "We'd love to see:", '\xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) ', 'Who are we?', 'Our Artificial Intelligence (AI) group: researchers and engineers who have a passion for solving complex problems. Our charter: to extract relevant, meaningful, tradable, and actionable information (pricings, earnings, recommendations and major events) from data (news, web, social media, and structured data) in real-time. Since our customers rely on this information to make swift financial decisions, we guarantee precision, accuracy and latency beyond most academic and industry standards. ', '\xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing ', "We'll trust you to:", "\xa05+ years of software development experience \xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field \xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them \xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing \xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java \xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN \xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ", ' ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code ', 'Who are you?', '\xa0Experience designing and using relational databases ', '\xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence ', '\xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', 'New York, NY - USA ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence', 'A strong software engineer who enjoys building and improving complex, large-scale systems. You like writing testable and maintainable code. You are autonomous: you know whether your time is best spent thinking about the architecture or writing a tool that helps you get the job done. You want to join a close-knit group and make a big impact. ']

['', 'Qualifications', 'Responsibilities', 'These Requirements Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following Specialized Security Screenings', 'Microsoft Cloud Background Check', "We'd Love To Talk To You, If You", 'Required Qualifications', "A bac <![CDATA[ PRINCIPAL PROGRAM MANAGER LEADDo you have a passion for making developers across Microsoft more productive? Do you love the gratification of helping someone in Microsoft deliver great products? Do you love learning how the leading tech companies make their developers more productive? Want to build and evolve the tools and tech that enable developers to build, test, and deploy in minutes? If so, and you’d like to do this across 6,000+ engineers, come join the Cosine Developer Productivity team!As a part of the Microsoft Cloud + AI division, the COSINE (Core Operating System & Intelligent Edge) organization delivers technologies and solutions for the Operating System platform foundation across Microsoft’s product lines. Whether it’s to power the 1+ Billion Windows 10 devices running in homes and businesses worldwide or to fueling the growth of highly scalable Azure Cloud and Windows Servers - we are the platform engine, critical in accomplishing the mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more!ResponsibilitiesOur team helps Developers creating Windows to be more productive by providing them services, tools and guidance. We are a fun tightly nit team who are super passionate about what we do and how we come together as team to do it. We deeply recognize that our team has one of the most leveraged Jobs at Microsoft. Small improvements in productivity of developers enable Microsoft in deliver far more valuable products to the Billion+ customers of ours, and we build on each others’ ideas to generate creative and novel ways to achieve our goals.We’re looking for a strong Principal PM Lead who cares deeply about the culture of the feature team to create the best ideas together… someone who is passionate about engaging with customers to know their needs well and comfortable in the use of data to make decisions.We'd Love To Talk To You, If YouAre a passionate problem solver, who continuously strives to make things betterEnjoy wearing multiple hats and digging in to make things happenAre equally comfortable articulating the big picture and refining the small details of a designAre customer and data obsessed, always learning, and refining your features to deliver maximum business impactLove pushing for clarity in communication and can explain large, complex systems, in simple-straightforward languageHave a strong drive to take a broad view on platform, thinking not only about the traditional topics of code and tools, but also in culture and needs of Developers.Know how to balance passion and opinion with being a great team playerRequired QualificationsYou have 3+ years of people management experienceYou are a genuine self-starter, who proactively identifies problems, proposes solutions and drives a team to address themYou are open-minded and continuously searching for “Why” behind the data being reported/observedYou are a change agent driving cultural change of your teamYou are strong technically, with a track record of successfully designing and delivering solutions for complex technical problemsA bachelor’s degree in Engineering or equivalent discipline required10+ years of experience designing and shipping high-quality software productsStrong written/verbal communication skillsThese Requirements Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following Specialized Security ScreeningsAbility to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role.Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.#ES3Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work."]

["Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. ", '\xa0 ', "Desire to Learn and Adapt. We have a lot of projects going on at once, and you'll have to learn to navigate the code and features. You'll constantly be learning new areas and new technologies. Passion. Our customers are passionateand we want the same from our engineers. We want you to actively own your work and be excited about your projects. Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.", "Are you interested in being part of a small team tasked to build the next-generation industry-leading platform for machine data? We are building a new foundation for Cloud offerings. Utilizing some of the most modern tools available, such as Kubernetes and Go, this is an excellent opportunity to impact the effort to define and build the future of our company. You will be joining a team that's developing both the engine that drives our machine-data platform as well as the infrastructure to run and scale it. ", "Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. ", 'What You Provide ', "Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. Breadth and depth. You want to work on an area that spans backend and frontend and SDKs? We have that. You want to go deep into optimizing how we compress data for fast random-access retrieval? We have that too, and more. Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. A stable, collaborative and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen and sit down for a quick sync every morning. Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. ', "We give our engineers an environment in which they can contribute from day one while also providing opportunities for learning and growth. You'll learn how our entire stack works - from data ingestion and storage to searching, reporting and building dashboards – all in distributed environments. The work you’ll do will directly impact the experience of our customers. ", 'Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.', 'We are an engineering- and product-focused company. Our engineers take a leading role in designing, architecting, building and testing our product. Engineers here have a wide impact, from developing new capabilities like metrics ingestion and analysis to working with customers to see their work be used to solve real-world problems. ', 'Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. ', "Balance. ['', 'Qualifications', 'Responsibilities', 'These Requirements Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following Specialized Security Screenings', 'Microsoft Cloud Background Check', "We'd Love To Talk To You, If You", 'Required Qualifications', "A bac <![CDATA[ PRINCIPAL PROGRAM MANAGER LEADDo you have a passion for making developers across Microsoft more productive? Do you love the gratification of helping someone in Microsoft deliver great products? Do you love learning how the leading tech companies make their developers more productive? Want to build and evolve the tools and tech that enable developers to build, test, and deploy in minutes? If so, and you’d like to do this across 6,000+ engineers, come join the Cosine Developer Productivity team!As a part of the Microsoft Cloud + AI division, the COSINE (Core Operating System & Intelligent Edge) organization delivers technologies and solutions for the Operating System platform foundation across Microsoft’s product lines. Whether it’s to power the 1+ Billion Windows 10 devices running in homes and businesses worldwide or to fueling the growth of highly scalable Azure Cloud and Windows Servers - we are the platform engine, critical in accomplishing the mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more!ResponsibilitiesOur team helps Developers creating Windows to be more productive by providing them services, tools and guidance. We are a fun tightly nit team who are super passionate about what we do and how we come together as team to do it. We deeply recognize that our team has one of the most leveraged Jobs at Microsoft. Small improvements in productivity of developers enable Microsoft in deliver far more valuable products to the Billion+ customers of ours, and we build on each others’ ideas to generate creative and novel ways to achieve our goals.We’re looking for a strong Principal PM Lead who cares deeply about the culture of the feature team to create the best ideas together… someone who is passionate about engaging with customers to know their needs well and comfortable in the use of data to make decisions.We'd Love To Talk To You, If YouAre a passionate problem solver, who continuously strives to make things betterEnjoy wearing multiple hats and digging in to make things happenAre equally comfortable articulating the big picture and refining the small details of a designAre customer and data obsessed, always learning, and refining your features to deliver maximum business impactLove pushing for clarity in communication and can explain large, complex systems, in simple-straightforward languageHave a strong drive to take a broad view on platform, thinking not only about the traditional topics of code and tools, but also in culture and needs of Developers.Know how to balance passion and opinion with being a great team playerRequired QualificationsYou have 3+ years of people management experienceYou are a genuine self-starter, who proactively identifies problems, proposes solutions and drives a team to address themYou are open-minded and continuously searching for “Why” behind the data being reported/observedYou are a change agent driving cultural change of your teamYou are strong technically, with a track record of successfully designing and delivering solutions for complex technical problemsA bachelor’s degree in Engineering or equivalent discipline required10+ years of experience designing and shipping high-quality software productsStrong written/verbal communication skillsThese Requirements Include, But Are Not Limited To, The Following Specialized Security ScreeningsAbility to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role.Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.#ES3Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work."]

Our Company's product ecosystem leverages data and the power of the network effect to create transparency, liquidity and efficient trade execution. Our company's Market Center, the company’s electronic trading platform, connects corporate bond market professionals to a broad network of liquidity and provides a range of trading protocols to access it.", 'Team-oriented and collaborative company culture', 'Here are some personal qualities and skills we’re looking for:', 'Option to work onsite at our New York office or remotely', 'You have experience working directly with corporate bonds or have worked extensively with post- trade processing of other asset classes', 'Lively and dynamic office space with fully stocked kitchen', 'Fully paid medical, dental and vision coverage', 'Linux, Docker, Ansible, and AWS for dynamic environments', 'Our Stack:', 'gRPC and protocol buffers for lightweight, point-to-point service communications', 'You are passionate about honing your craft inside and outside of work', '\xa0', 'Our Company is a financial technology company bringing efficiency, connectivity and access to credit trading', 'Develop tools for handling bond calculations, trade execution, reporting and all other post-trade functions', 'Benefits:', "What You'll Do:", 'Competitive compensationFully paid medical, dental and vision coverageOption to work onsite at our New York office or remotelyLively and dynamic office space with fully stocked kitchenTeam-oriented and collaborative company culture', 'Competitive compensation', 'Scala with Akka Streams for efficient stream processingKafka for scalable messaginggRPC and protocol buffers for lightweight, point-to-point service communicationsLinux, Docker, Ansible, and AWS for dynamic environmentsGoogle Apps, Slack, and Zoom for open communication and collaboration', 'We are seeking an engineer to join our Platform team and focus on developing our post-trade processing. The ideal candidate will have prior experience working with corporate bonds or with post-trade processing of other asset classes. You will work closely with other developers, the product team and our operation partners to help define post-trade solutions to use both internally and for clients.', 'Scala with Akka Streams for efficient stream processing', 'Google Apps, Slack, and Zoom for open communication and collaboration', 'Design and develop a next generation system for post-trade processing and automation of treasury execution', 'This is a unique opportunity to be an integral part of our technology team. We take a leading-edge approach to everything we do - from our tech stack to our remote working style - we want our employees to succeed. Our institutional credit trading platform allows for continued innovation andfollows a microservices architecture with multiple Electron-based frontend applications.', 'Design and develop a next generation system for post-trade processing and automation of treasury executionPartner with the product and operations teams to gather and understand key requirements, design, and develop system functionality and implement the solutionsDevelop tools for handling bond calculations, trade execution, reporting and all other post-trade functions', 'You are skilled in concurrency, distributed message-based systems, and have a deep affinity for building reliable, high-throughput, lower latency solutions', 'You can clearly communicate your ideas and give and accept direct feedback', 'You are equally excited by experimenting with new technologies as you are about delivering value through maintainable, scalable, and reliable services', 'Kafka for scalable messaging', 'Senior Software Engineer, FINTECH', 'About the Role:']

["Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. ", '\xa0 ', "Desire to Learn and Adapt. We have a lot of projects going on at once, and you'll have to learn to navigate the code and features. You'll constantly be learning new areas and new technologies. Passion. Our customers are passionateand we want the same from our engineers. We want you to actively own your work and be excited about your projects. Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.", "Are you interested in being part of a small team tasked to build the next-generation industry-leading platform for machine data? We are building a new foundation for Cloud offerings. Utilizing some of the most modern tools available, such as Kubernetes and Go, this is an excellent opportunity to impact the effort to define and build the future of our company. You will be joining a team that's developing both the engine that drives our machine-data platform as well as the infrastructure to run and scale it. ", "Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. ", 'What You Provide ', "Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. Breadth and depth. You want to work on an area that spans backend and frontend and SDKs? We have that. You want to go deep into optimizing how we compress data for fast random-access retrieval? We have that too, and more. Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. A stable, collaborative and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen and sit down for a quick sync every morning. Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. ', "We give our engineers an environment in which they can contribute from day one while also providing opportunities for learning and growth. You'll learn how our entire stack works - from data ingestion and storage to searching, reporting and building dashboards – all in distributed environments. The work you’ll do will directly impact the experience of our customers. ", 'Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.', 'We are an engineering- and product-focused company. Our engineers take a leading role in designing, architecting, building and testing our product. Engineers here have a wide impact, from developing new capabilities like metrics ingestion and analysis to working with customers to see their work be used to solve real-world problems. ', 'Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. ', "Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies ', 'What We Provide', 'What We Provide ', 'What You Provide', ' ', 'Breadth and depth. You want to work on an area that spans backend and frontend and SDKs? We have that. You want to go deep into optimizing how we compress data for fast random-access retrieval? We have that too, and more. ', 'A stable, collaborative and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen and sit down for a quick sync every morning. ', 'Passion. Our customers are passionateand we want the same from our engineers. We want you to actively own your work and be excited about your projects. ', "Desire to Learn and Adapt. We have a lot of projects going on at once, and you'll have to learn to navigate the code and features. You'll constantly be learning new areas and new technologies. "]

', 'A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering or another Engineering-related technology field; ', 'Linux-C++ Senior Software Engineer New York, NY - USA\xa0Our software team implements world-class software solutions for our Financial Information eXchange (FIX) engine. Our company's Market Center, the company’s electronic trading platform, connects corporate bond market professionals to a broad network of liquidity and provides a range of trading protocols to access it.", 'Team-oriented and collaborative company culture', 'Here are some personal qualities and skills we’re looking for:', 'Option to work onsite at our New York office or remotely', 'You have experience working directly with corporate bonds or have worked extensively with post- trade processing of other asset classes', 'Lively and dynamic office space with fully stocked kitchen', 'Fully paid medical, dental and vision coverage', 'Linux, Docker, Ansible, and AWS for dynamic environments', 'Our Stack:', 'gRPC and protocol buffers for lightweight, point-to-point service communications', 'You are passionate about honing your craft inside and outside of work', '\xa0', 'Our Company is a financial technology company bringing efficiency, connectivity and access to credit trading', 'Develop tools for handling bond calculations, trade execution, reporting and all other post-trade functions', 'Benefits:', "What You'll Do:", 'Competitive compensationFully paid medical, dental and vision coverageOption to work onsite at our New York office or remotelyLively and dynamic office space with fully stocked kitchenTeam-oriented and collaborative company culture', 'Competitive compensation', 'Scala with Akka Streams for efficient stream processingKafka for scalable messaginggRPC and protocol buffers for lightweight, point-to-point service communicationsLinux, Docker, Ansible, and AWS for dynamic environmentsGoogle Apps, Slack, and Zoom for open communication and collaboration', 'We are seeking an engineer to join our Platform team and focus on developing our post-trade processing. You will work closely with other developers, the product team and our operation partners to help define post-trade solutions to use both internally and for clients.', 'Scala with Akka Streams for efficient stream processing', 'Google Apps, Slack, and Zoom for open communication and collaboration', 'Design and develop a next generation system for post-trade processing and automation of treasury execution', 'This is a unique opportunity to be an integral part of our technology team. ['', 'Diligent, thorough, with an eye for detail', 'Promote our new initiatives to colleagues, while clearly communicating our reasoning and intentions', 'CI', 'Responsibilities', 'Keeps tabs on best practices in the wider developer community', 'Working with medium-to-large scale web applications', 'Understand the business needs of Cloud customers, the architecture of the system and limitations within the various products within the Cloud group', 'Develop strong rapports with other teams and understand how best to work with them to achieve success', 'JavaPythonJavascript (NodeJS)CILinuxBazelScala', 'Work closely with our engineers to identify inefficient practices and blockers', 'Resourceful - finds a way around blockers', 'Python', 'Linux', 'A Senior Software Engineer in Developer Productivity will be successful in this role when they:', 'Drive initiatives, from scope to implementation, engaging Cloud engineers and stakeholders along the way', 'Have both breadth and depth across the various codebases, languages and toolchains within Cloud', 'New York (or remote)', 'The Cloud Developer Productivity team helps our engineers do their best work. We build platforms and tools to support our engineering teams, spread and enable best-practices and demonstrate new approaches with proof-of-concept technical spikes. We support our fastest-growing product, Atlas, enabling developers to do exciting feature development with optimized tools and a fast feedback cycle.', 'The database market is massive and our company is at the head of its disruption. Our community is transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.', 'Passionate about developer productivity - improving the status quo', 'Our company provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.', 'Bazel', 'Can drive initiatives from start to finish and are diligent in engaging all relevant stakeholders', 'Express yourself clearly in both written documentation and when responding to questions from developers', "We are currently working on making our test result analyzer available company wide, as well as moving to Bazel. We're learning as we go, so there is lots of room to learn on the job and give back to the community / open source.", 'Drive initiatives, from scope to implementation, engaging Cloud engineers and stakeholders along the wayPromote our new initiatives to colleagues, while clearly communicating our reasoning and intentionsWork closely with our engineers to identify inefficient practices and blockersExpress yourself clearly in both written documentation and when responding to questions from developersOwn our core values and adhere to them in your workSuccess Measures', 'Java', 'Our Main Technologies', 'Have both breadth and depth across the various codebases, languages and toolchains within CloudIdentify, pitch, and ship enhancements that improve developer quality of lifeUnderstand the business needs of Cloud customers, the architecture of the system and limitations within the various products within the Cloud groupDevelop strong rapports with other teams and understand how best to work with them to achieve successCan drive initiatives from start to finish and are diligent in engaging all relevant stakeholders', 'Identify, pitch, and ship enhancements that improve developer quality of life', 'We are looking for someone who is', 'Curious, and constantly learning', 'Creating and managing continuous integration pipelines or writing developer tools', 'Senior Software Engineer, Developer Productivity', 'About Cloud Engineering', 'Javascript (NodeJS)', 'Scala', 'Own our core values and adhere to them in your work', 'Our Cloud Services Team is a diverse group working together to enable our customers to use our technology in the Cloud at global scale.', "To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we're committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees' wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys. Learn more about what it's like to work at our firm and help us make an impact on the world!", 'Success Measures']

["Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. ", '\xa0 ', "Desire to Learn and Adapt. We have a lot of projects going on at once, and you'll have to learn to navigate the code and features. You'll constantly be learning new areas and new technologies. Passion. Our customers are passionateand we want the same from our engineers. We want you to actively own your work and be excited about your projects. Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.", "Are you interested in being part of a small team tasked to build the next-generation industry-leading platform for machine data? We are building a new foundation for Cloud offerings. Utilizing some of the most modern tools available, such as Kubernetes and Go, this is an excellent opportunity to impact the effort to define and build the future of our company. You will be joining a team that's developing both the engine that drives our machine-data platform as well as the infrastructure to run and scale it. ", "Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. ", 'What You Provide ', "Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. Breadth and depth. You want to work on an area that spans backend and frontend and SDKs? We have that. You want to go deep into optimizing how we compress data for fast random-access retrieval? We have that too, and more. Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. A stable, collaborative and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen and sit down for a quick sync every morning. Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. ', "We give our engineers an environment in which they can contribute from day one while also providing opportunities for learning and growth. You'll learn how our entire stack works - from data ingestion and storage to searching, reporting and building dashboards – all in distributed environments. The work you’ll do will directly impact the experience of our customers. ", 'Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.', 'We are an engineering- and product-focused company. Our engineers take a leading role in designing, architecting, building and testing our product. Engineers here have a wide impact, from developing new capabilities like metrics ingestion and analysis to working with customers to see their work be used to solve real-world problems. ', 'Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. ', "Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies ', 'What We Provide', 'What We Provide ', 'What You Provide', ' ', 'Breadth and depth. You want to work on an area that spans backend and frontend and SDKs? We have that. You want to go deep into optimizing how we compress data for fast random-access retrieval? We have that too, and more. ', 'A stable, collaborative and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen and sit down for a quick sync every morning. ', 'Passion. Our customers are passionateand we want the same from our engineers. We want you to actively own your work and be excited about your projects. ', "Desire to Learn and Adapt. We have a lot of projects going on at once, and you'll have to learn to navigate the code and features. You'll constantly be learning new areas and new technologies. "]

['', 'Be self-motivated, to garner the necessary skills & knowledge to complete your assigned projects successfully; ', 'Familiarity with SDLC tools in a CI/CD environment, such as GITHub, Coverity, Jenkins, graphical debuggers, etc. ', 'Linux-C++ Senior Software Engineer ', 'Jenkins, Google Test/Mock, Pytest, Splunk, Grafana; ', 'Good design/architecture skills for large-scale systems; ', 'We’d love to see:', 'Management roles exist in the future – if that’s something you’d be interested in; ', '3+ years C++ programming in a Linux or other recent UNIX O/S; ', 'Drive your own software solutions, from inception to production release; Be self-motivated, to garner the necessary skills & knowledge to complete your assigned projects successfully; Collaborate with other engineers, business managers, sharing your expertise, and leverage from the experience of seasoned peers; ', 'Knowledge of TLS/SSL Encryption, Open SSL; ', 'Excellent analytical, problem solving skills; ', 'Multi-threading, multi-process, distributed/parallel programming, UNIX IPC; ', 'Familiarity with Python, Perl or UNIX shell scripting; Jenkins, Google Test/Mock, Pytest, Splunk, Grafana; Familiarity with persistent messaging, such as MQ, Kafka; Machine learning background; Knowledge of TLS/SSL Encryption, Open SSL; ', 'What’s in it for you:', 'Machine learning background; ', 'Become an expert in architecting and constructing high-performance, nimble, scalable software solutions, using industry-standard technology; ', 'Drive your own software solutions, from inception to production release; ', 'Familiarity with Python, Perl or UNIX shell scripting; ', 'In-depth exposure to developing systems for all the company’s electronic trading clients; Become an expert in architecting and constructing high-performance, nimble, scalable software solutions, using industry-standard technology; Management roles exist in the future – if that’s something you’d be interested in; ', '3+ years C++ programming in a Linux or other recent UNIX O/S; Multi-threading, multi-process, distributed/parallel programming, UNIX IPC; Good design/architecture skills for large-scale systems; Excellent analytical, problem solving skills; Familiarity with SDLC tools in a CI/CD environment, such as GITHub, Coverity, Jenkins, graphical debuggers, etc. A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering or another Engineering-related technology field; ', 'We’ll trust you to:', 'Collaborate with other engineers, business managers, sharing your expertise, and leverage from the experience of seasoned peers; ', 'In-depth exposure to developing systems for all the company’s electronic trading clients; ', 'A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering or another Engineering-related technology field; ', 'Linux-C++ Senior Software Engineer New York, NY - USA\xa0Our software team implements world-class software solutions for our Financial Information eXchange (FIX) engine. These applications operate in a HA environment, servicing our electronic trading broker-dealers around the globe. The SLAs set by our High-Frequency/algorithmic Trading clients mean that our FIX Engine must exceed high-performance, low-latency benchmarks. To ensure privacy and secure connectivity, we use industry standard encryption protocols, such as AES, for all electronic trading communications.\xa0Join our growing team of developers, innovate our cluster-based software solution, and architect our upcoming cloud-based offering. FIX is the industry standard for electronic trading communications: capitalize on this opportunity, using the skills from this position to propel your software engineering career into the future of the electronic trading.\xa0What’s in it for you: ', 'You’ll need to have:', 'Familiarity with persistent messaging, such as MQ, Kafka; ']

job_text: ['', ' Contribute to architecture and solutions that support integrations with console platforms. Collaborate on the architecture of a cross-platform user experience framework. Be an individual contributor on the team building reference designs, tackling challenging and ambiguous technical solutions, conducting design and coding reviews. Implement technical outcomes and tools that create cohesive and natural player experiences for Riot’s games on console. Partner with product owners and technical leads to build and operate features end-to-end Work with game teams’ technical leads in wholly understanding development needs and challenges when working with central technologies at Riot Provide high-quality software by writing unit, functional, and integration tests Invest in team’s complete ownership of our products by participating in on-call rotation ', 'Be an individual contributor on the team building reference designs, tackling challenging and ambiguous technical solutions, conducting design and coding reviews.', 'Collaborate on the architecture of a cross-platform user experience framework.', 'Experience shipping applications or games to any of the following platforms: XB1, PS4, Nintendo Switch.', 'Familiarity with Cloud Platform providers like AWS or GCP', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience implementing solutions for technical consumers.', 'Familiarity with “Infrastructure as Code” and tooling like Terraform, Docker and Jenkins', 'Work with game teams’ technical leads in wholly understanding development needs and challenges when working with central technologies at Riot', ' Familiarity with “Infrastructure as Code” and tooling like Terraform, Docker and Jenkins Familiarity with Cloud Platform providers like AWS or GCP Experience implementing solutions for technical consumers. ', '3+ years of experience in a software engineering role (i.e. software, systems, architecture)', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Experience defining and delivering technical solutions to technical customers/users.', 'Provide high-quality software by writing unit, functional, and integration tests', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent experience', 'Player Platform, Console Experiences', 'Senior', 'Implement technical outcomes and tools that create cohesive and natural player experiences for Riot’s games on console.', 'Required Qualifications']

["Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. ", '\xa0 ', "Desire to Learn and Adapt. We have a lot of projects going on at once, and you'll have to learn to navigate the code and features. You'll constantly be learning new areas and new technologies. Passion. Our customers are passionateand we want the same from our engineers. We want you to actively own your work and be excited about your projects. Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.", "Are you interested in being part of a small team tasked to build the next-generation industry-leading platform for machine data? We are building a new foundation for Cloud offerings. Utilizing some of the most modern tools available, such as Kubernetes and Go, this is an excellent opportunity to impact the effort to define and build the future of our company. You will be joining a team that's developing both the engine that drives our machine-data platform as well as the infrastructure to run and scale it. ", "Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. ", 'What You Provide ', "Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. Breadth and depth. You want to work on an area that spans backend and frontend and SDKs? We have that. You want to go deep into optimizing how we compress data for fast random-access retrieval? We have that too, and more. Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. A stable, collaborative and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen and sit down for a quick sync every morning. Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. ', "We give our engineers an environment in which they can contribute from day one while also providing opportunities for learning and growth. You'll learn how our entire stack works - from data ingestion and storage to searching, reporting and building dashboards – all in distributed environments. The work you’ll do will directly impact the experience of our customers. ", 'Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.', 'We are an engineering- and product-focused company. Our engineers take a leading role in designing, architecting, building and testing our product. Engineers here have a wide impact, from developing new capabilities like metrics ingestion and analysis to working with customers to see their work be used to solve real-world problems. ', 'Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. ', "Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies ', 'What We Provide', 'What We Provide ', 'What You Provide', ' ', 'Breadth and depth. ', 'A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering or another Engineering-related technology field; ', 'Linux-C++ Senior Software Engineer New York, NY - USA\xa0Our software team implements world-class software solutions for our Financial Information eXchange (FIX) engine. These applications operate in a HA environment, servicing our electronic trading broker-dealers around the globe. The SLAs set by our High-Frequency/algorithmic Trading clients mean that our FIX Engine must exceed high-performance, low-latency benchmarks. To ensure privacy and secure connectivity, we use industry standard encryption protocols, such as AES, for all electronic trading communications.\xa0Join our growing team of developers, innovate our cluster-based software solution, and architect our upcoming cloud-based offering. FIX is the industry standard for electronic trading communications: capitalize on this opportunity, using the skills from this position to propel your software engineering career into the future of the electronic trading.\xa0What’s in it for you: ', 'You’ll need to have:', 'Familiarity with persistent messaging, such as MQ, Kafka; ']

["Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. ", '\xa0 ', "Desire to Learn and Adapt. We have a lot of projects going on at once, and you'll have to learn to navigate the code and features. You'll constantly be learning new areas and new technologies. Passion. Our customers are passionateand we want the same from our engineers. We want you to actively own your work and be excited about your projects. Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.", "Are you interested in being part of a small team tasked to build the next-generation industry-leading platform for machine data? We are building a new foundation for Cloud offerings. Utilizing some of the most modern tools available, such as Kubernetes and Go, this is an excellent opportunity to impact the effort to define and build the future of our company. You will be joining a team that's developing both the engine that drives our machine-data platform as well as the infrastructure to run and scale it. ", "Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. ", 'What You Provide ', "Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. Breadth and depth. You want to work on an area that spans backend and frontend and SDKs? We have that. You want to go deep into optimizing how we compress data for fast random-access retrieval? We have that too, and more. Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. A stable, collaborative and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen and sit down for a quick sync every morning. Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. ', "We give our engineers an environment in which they can contribute from day one while also providing opportunities for learning and growth. You'll learn how our entire stack works - from data ingestion and storage to searching, reporting and building dashboards – all in distributed environments. The work you’ll do will directly impact the experience of our customers. ", 'Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.', 'We are an engineering- and product-focused company. Our engineers take a leading role in designing, architecting, building and testing our product. Engineers here have a wide impact, from developing new capabilities like metrics ingestion and analysis to working with customers to see their work be used to solve real-world problems. ', 'Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. ', "Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", 'Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies ', 'What We Provide', 'What We Provide ', 'What You Provide', ' ', 'Breadth and depth. ', 'A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering or another Engineering-related technology field; ', 'Linux-C++ Senior Software Engineer New York, NY - USA\xa0Our software team implements world-class software solutions for our Financial Information eXchange (FIX) engine. Our Company's product ecosystem leverages data and the power of the network effect to create transparency, liquidity and efficient trade execution. Our company's Market Center, the company’s electronic trading platform, connects corporate bond market professionals to a broad network of liquidity and provides a range of trading protocols to access it.", 'Team-oriented and collaborative company culture', 'Here are some personal qualities and skills we’re looking for:', 'Option to work onsite at our New York office or remotely', 'You have job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Fixed Income Trading
job_text: ['', 'You view software engineering less as writing code and more as delivering high-value, innovative solutions to real-world problems', 'You strive to make everything around you better', 'Partner with the product and operations teams to gather and understand key requirements, design, and develop system functionality and implement the solutions', 'We provide some of the best perks in the industry, including:', "through innovative technology and product design. Our Company's product ecosystem leverages data and the power of the network effect to create transparency, liquidity and efficient trade execution. Our company's Market Center, the company’s electronic trading platform, connects corporate bond market professionals to a broad network of liquidity and provides a range of trading protocols to access it.", 'Team-oriented and collaborative company culture', 'Here are some personal qualities and skills we’re looking for:', 'Option to work onsite at our New York office or remotely', 'You have experience working directly with corporate bonds or have worked extensively with post- trade processing of other asset classes', 'Lively and dynamic office space with fully stocked kitchen', 'Fully paid medical, dental and vision coverage', 'Linux, Docker, Ansible, and AWS for dynamic environments', 'Our Stack:', 'You are passionate about honing your craft inside and outside of work ', 'gRPC and protocol buffers for lightweight, point-to-point service communications', ' Scala with Akka Streams for efficient stream processing', '\xa0', 'Our Company is a financial technology company bringing efficiency, connectivity and access to credit trading', 'Develop tools for handling bond calculations, trade execution, reporting and all other post-trade functions', 'Benefits:', "What You'll Do:", ' Scala with Akka Streams for efficient stream processingKafka for scalable messaginggRPC and protocol buffers for lightweight, point-to-point service communicationsLinux, Docker, Ansible, and AWS for dynamic environmentsGoogle Apps, Slack, and Zoom for open communication and collaboration ', 'Competitive compensationFully paid medical, dental and vision coverageOption to work onsite at our New York office or remotelyLively and dynamic office space with fully stocked kitchenTeam-oriented and collaborative company culture', 'Senior Software Engineer, Fixed Income Trading', 'You strive to make everything around you betterYou are equally excited by experimenting with new technologies as you are about delivering value through maintainable, scalable, and reliable servicesYou view software engineering less as writing code and more as delivering high-value, innovative solutions to real-world problemsYou have experience working directly with corporate bonds or have worked extensively with post- trade processing of other asset classesYou are skilled in concurrency, distributed message-based systems, and have a deep affinity for building reliable, high-throughput, lower latency solutionsYou can clearly communicate your ideas and give and accept direct feedbackYou are passionate about honing your craft inside and outside of work ', 'Competitive compensation', 'We are seeking an engineer to join our Platform team and focus on developing our post-trade processing. The ideal candidate will have prior experience working with corporate bonds or with post-trade processing of other asset classes. You will work closely with other developers, the product team and our operation partners to help define post-trade solutions to use both internally and for clients.', 'Design and develop a next generation system for post-trade processing and automation of treasury execution', 'This is a unique opportunity to be an integral part of our technology team. We take a leading-edge approach to everything we do - from our tech stack to our remote working style - we want our employees to succeed. Our institutional credit trading platform allows for continued innovation andfollows a microservices architecture with multiple Electron-based frontend applications.', 'Design and develop a next generation system for post-trade processing and automation of treasury executionPartner with the product and operations teams to gather and understand key requirements, design, and develop system functionality and implement the solutionsDevelop tools for handling bond calculations, trade execution, reporting and all other post-trade functions', 'Google Apps, Slack, and Zoom for open communication and collaboration ', 'You are skilled in concurrency, distributed message-based systems, and have a deep affinity for building reliable, high-throughput, lower latency solutions', 'You can clearly communicate your ideas and give and accept direct feedback', 'You are equally excited by experimenting with new technologies as you are about delivering value through maintainable, scalable, and reliable services', 'Kafka for scalable messaging', 'About the Role:']

', 'A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering or another Engineering-related technology field; ', 'Linux-C++ Senior Software Engineer New York, NY - USA\xa0Our software team implements world-class software solutions for our Financial Information eXchange (FIX) engine.
