job_title: Data Engineer (AWS S3, Python, Spark, EMR, Glue)
job_text: ['', 'Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.', 'Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures, and data sets.Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency, and workload management.A successful history of manipulating, processing, and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores.Strong project management and organizational skills.Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.We are looking for a candidate with 5+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. They should also have experience using the following software/tools:Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc.Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra.Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools: Azkaban, Luigi, Airflow, etc.Experience with AWS cloud services: EC2, EMR, RDS, RedshiftExperience with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc.Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc.', 'Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.', 'Experience with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc.', 'Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc.', 'Qualifications For Data Engineer', 'Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.', 'A successful history of manipulating, processing, and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.', 'Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture.Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘big data’ technologies.Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and other key business performance metrics.Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data, and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.Keep our data separated and secure across national boundaries through multiple data centers and AWS regions.Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems.', 'We are looking for a candidate with 5+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. They should also have experience using the following software/tools:', 'Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘big data’ technologies.', 'Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores.', 'Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems.', 'Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and other key business performance metrics.', 'Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.', 'Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.', 'Keep our data separated and secure across national boundaries through multiple data centers and AWS regions.', 'Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.', 'Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra.', 'Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data, and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.', 'Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency, and workload management.', 'Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures, and data sets.', 'Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools: Azkaban, Luigi, Airflow, etc.', 'Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture.', 'Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc.', 'Experience with AWS cloud services: EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift', 'Strong project management and organizational skills.']

['', "We are looking for a qualified Java Developer to passionately promote the adoption of a major tech company's solutions in key enterprise accounts, government agencies, and service provider partners. Through a series of interactions both in-person and remotely, you will win the trust and confidence of customers' engineering, development, and operations teams by aligning their requirements and use cases with the functional capabilities of the solution. As a Cloud Developer, you'll play a critical role in bringing together cross-functional teams from Product Engineering, Support, Professional Services, and Sales to meet the needs of our most demanding customers. You will also act as the customer's advocate with these organizations to deliver the right solutions and ensure they are implemented and supported in an innovative and reliable way. We'll need you to have a thorough working knowledge and hands-on experience with JEE, middleware application architectures (i.e. enterprise integration, business automation, big data, mobility), and their supporting infrastructures. You will also need a good understanding of how to leverage unique middleware applications (i.e. JBoss Middleware, JBoss Fuse, and OpenShift) for implementing custom solutions, as well as capabilities in DevOps, continuous integration, and cloud-based development consulting projects. ['', "We are looking for a qualified Java Developer to passionately promote the adoption of a major tech company's solutions in key enterprise accounts, government agencies, and service provider partners. As a Cloud Developer, you'll play a critical role in bringing together cross-functional teams from Product Engineering, Support, Professional Services, and Sales to meet the needs of our most demanding customers. You will also need a good understanding of how to leverage unique middleware applications (i.e. JBoss Middleware, JBoss Fuse, and OpenShift) for implementing custom solutions, as well as capabilities in DevOps, continuous integration, and cloud-based development consulting projects. ["Our Engineers are innovators and problem-solvers, building solutions in risk management, big data, mobile and more. We look for creative collaborators who evolve, adapt to change and thrive in a fast-paced global environment.Responsibilities •  \xa0 You are energetic, self-directed and self-motivated, able to build and sustain long-term relationships with clients and colleagues•  \xa0 You approach problem solving with an open mind within the context of a team•  \xa0 You have exceptional analytical skills, able to apply knowledge and experience in decision-making to arrive at creative and commercial solutions•  \xa0 You possess a strong desire to learn and contribute solutions and ideas to a broad team•  \xa0 You are independent and comfortable in a fast paced, ambiguous and often multi-directional work environments•  \xa0 You collaborate with globally-located cross functional team in building customer-centric products•  \xa0 You analyze existing software implementations to identify areas of improvement and provide estimates for implementing new features•  \xa0 You follow standard software development guidelines and best practices•  \xa0 You create and maintain test plans, documentation and automated testing routines for all technical changes•  \xa0 You grow technical skillset by seeking out cross-training and knowledge advancement opportunitiesQualifications•  \xa0 Bachelor's degree with a concentration in Computer Science or related field•  \xa0 4+ years of experience with Java or other related Object Oriented development language•  \xa0 Experience with Javascript frameworks (Angular, Typescript, ReactJS)•  \xa0 Web development experience with HTML5, CSS3•  \xa0 Experience writing SQL queries•  \xa0 Strong written and verbal communication skills•  \xa0 Ability to establish trusted partnerships with product heads Preferred Qualifications•  \xa0 Basic knowledge of XML and JSON•  \xa0 Source Control Management systems (i.e., SVN, Git)•  \xa0 An understanding of common application architecture design patterns (i.e., MVC, MVVM)•  \xa0 Experience working in an Agile environment"]

We look for creative collaborators who evolve, adapt to change and thrive in a fast-paced global environment.Responsibilities •  \xa0 You are energetic, self-directed and self-motivated, able to build and sustain long-term relationships with clients and colleagues•  \xa0 You approach problem solving with an open mind within the context of a team•  \xa0 You have exceptional analytical skills, able to apply knowledge and experience in decision-making to arrive at creative and commercial solutions•  \xa0 You possess a strong desire to learn and contribute solutions and ideas to a broad team•  \xa0 You are independent and comfortable in a fast paced, ambiguous and often multi-directional work environments•  \xa0 You collaborate with globally-located cross functional team in building customer-centric products•  \xa0 You analyze existing software implementations to identify areas of improvement and provide estimates for implementing new features•  \xa0 You follow standard software development guidelines and best practices•  \xa0 You create and maintain test plans, documentation and automated testing routines for all technical changes•  \xa0 You grow technical skillset by seeking out cross-training and knowledge advancement opportunitiesQualifications•  \xa0 Bachelor's degree with a concentration in Computer Science or related field•  \xa0 4+ years of experience with Java or other related Object Oriented development language•  \xa0 Experience with Javascript frameworks (Angular, Typescript, ReactJS)•  \xa0 Web development experience with HTML5, CSS3•  \xa0 Experience writing SQL queries•  \xa0 Strong written and verbal communication skills•  \xa0 Ability to establish trusted partnerships with product heads Preferred Qualifications•  \xa0 Basic knowledge of XML and JSON•  \xa0 Source Control Management systems (i.e., SVN, Git)•  \xa0 An understanding of common application architecture design patterns (i.e., MVC, MVVM)•  \xa0 Experience working in an Agile environment"]

["Our Engineers are innovators and problem-solvers, building solutions in risk management, big data, mobile and more. We look for creative collaborators who evolve, adapt to change and thrive in a fast-paced global environment.Responsibilities •  \xa0 You are energetic, self-directed and self-motivated, able to build and sustain long-term relationships with clients and colleagues•  \xa0 You approach problem solving with an open mind within the context of a team•  \xa0 You have exceptional analytical skills, able to apply knowledge and experience in decision-making to arrive at creative and commercial solutions•  \xa0 You possess a strong desire to learn and contribute solutions and ideas to a broad team•  \xa0 You are independent and comfortable in a fast paced, ambiguous and often multi-directional work environments•  \xa0 You collaborate with globally-located cross functional team in building customer-centric products•  \xa0 You analyze existing software implementations to identify areas of improvement and provide estimates for implementing new features•  \xa0 You follow standard software development guidelines and best practices•  \xa0 You create and maintain test plans, documentation and automated testing routines for all technical changes•  \xa0 You grow technical skillset by seeking out cross-training and knowledge advancement opportunitiesQualifications•  \xa0 Bachelor's degree with a concentration in Computer Science or related field•  \xa0 4+ years of experience with Java or other related Object Oriented development language•  \xa0 Experience with Javascript frameworks (Angular, Typescript, ReactJS)•  \xa0 Web development experience with HTML5, CSS3•  \xa0 Experience writing SQL queries•  \xa0 Strong written and verbal communication skills•  \xa0 Ability to establish trusted partnerships with product heads Preferred Qualifications•  \xa0 Basic knowledge of XML and JSON•  \xa0 Source Control Management systems (i.e., SVN, Git)•  \xa0 An understanding of common application architecture design patterns (i.e., MVC, MVVM)•  \xa0 Experience working in an Agile environment"]

', 'Experience with the Firebase stack including RTDB, Firestore, Cloud Functions, etc. ', 'Requirements', 'How We Do It', 'As a full-stack engineer, you will be expected to have a familiarity with both front end and backend technologies and best practices. For front end responsibilities, you should have knowledge of responsive design techniques to create compelling experiences, with a mobile-first mindset, using the Angular framework (version 9+). This will be a single-page application that displays real-time results and timing data. On the back end, you will integrate with various track & field timing software and systems, create RESTful API endpoints with JSON, and work with databases such as MySQL and Firestore.
